translation.en: EMERSON: It's life or death now, James.
translation.zh: 不是无期徒刑就是死刑 詹姆斯

translation.en: By that, I mean you're doing one or the other up in Rockview.
translation.zh: 要么死 要么在罗克维优监狱了此一生

translation.en: This here is District Attorney Rodin.
translation.zh: 这位是地方检察官 罗丁

translation.en: Want to know what he's wondering?
translation.zh: 知道他对你的看法吗？

translation.en: Whether you're gonna walk like a man or cry like a pussy
translation.zh: 你或像男人那样走出去 或像女人哭哭啼啼走进死囚牢房

translation.en: on your way to the death house.
translation.zh: 或像女人哭哭啼啼走进死囚牢房

translation.en: See, the D.A. likes the needle,
translation.zh: 知道吗？检察官喜欢注射处死

translation.en: whereas me,
translation.zh: 至于我吗 很想看着你长命百岁

translation.en: I like to see a man like you live a long life
translation.zh: 至于我吗 很想看着你长命百岁 直到你所有的牙都被打掉

translation.en: with all your teeth knocked out.
translation.zh: 直到你所有的牙都被打掉 被众多的狱友同志玩得放屁都不响

translation.en: Passed around till a brother can't tell your fart
translation.zh: 被众多的狱友同志玩得放屁都不响

translation.en: Now, I don't know what kind of man you are,
translation.zh: 我不知道你选择哪一种命运

translation.en: which of these two fates you prefer,
translation.zh: 我不知道你选择哪一种命运 罗丁是个仁慈的人

translation.en: but Rodin here is a generous fellow.
translation.zh: 罗丁是个仁慈的人 他会让你自己选择

translation.en: He's willing to let you take your pick.
translation.zh: 他会让你自己选择 如果你不想耗时费力

translation.en: If you save us and this city a long and costly trial,
translation.zh: 如果你不想耗时费力 那就放弃聘请律师 马上承认罪行

translation.en: waive your right to counsel and confess, right now.
translation.zh: 那就放弃聘请律师 马上承认罪行

translation.en: Sixteen hours. Has to be some kind of record, Detective.
translation.zh: 16个小时了 探员 该有结果了

translation.en: What the hell is this?
translation.zh: 这是什么意思？

translation.en: Who the hell is Jack Reacher?
translation.zh: 杰克 雷彻是什么人？

translation.en: Jack Reacher,
translation.zh: 杰克 雷彻 乳名杰克

translation.en: born Jack, not John, no middle name,
translation.zh: 阿勒格尼县 地方检察官

translation.en: is a ghost.
translation.zh: 没有中间名 来去无踪

translation.en: No driver's license, current or expired. No residence, current or former.
translation.zh: 没有驾驶证 没有确切住址

translation.en: No credit cards, no credit history.
translation.zh: 没有信用卡和用卡记录 没有手机 电子邮箱 什么都没有

translation.en: No P.O. box, cell phone, e-mail.
translation.zh: 没有手机 电子邮箱 什么都没有

translation.en: Nothing.
translation.zh: 至少能告诉我他是谁吧

translation.en: Can you at least tell me who he is?
translation.zh: 至少能告诉我他是谁吧 可以告诉你他以前是谁

translation.en: Well, I can tell you who he was. Blood military.
translation.zh: 可以告诉你他以前是谁 他家几代都是军人

translation.en: Born and raised on bases abroad.
translation.zh: 在国外的军事基地出生长大 母亲是法国人

translation.en: Mother was a French national, father in the Corps.
translation.zh: 母亲是法国人 父亲在海军陆战队服役 他第一次来美国是去西点军校上学

translation.en: His first trip to the United States
translation.zh: 他第一次来美国是去西点军校上学

translation.en: was to attend West Point.
translation.zh: 他第一次来美国是去西点军校上学 爱心商店 四年以后 到海外执行任务

translation.en: Four years later, he ships out for good.
translation.zh: 四年以后 到海外执行任务 伊拉克 阿富汗 巴尔干半岛 都去过

translation.en: Iraq. Afghanistan. The Balkans. You name it.
translation.zh: 伊拉克 阿富汗 巴尔干半岛 都去过

translation.en: Served with distinction.
translation.zh: 出色地完成了各种任务 获得银星勋章 青铜星章 功勋勋章

translation.en: Silver Star, Bronze Star, Legion of Merit.
translation.zh: 获得银星勋章 青铜星章 功勋勋章

translation.en: Defense Superior Service Medal?
translation.zh: 国防部服役优秀勋章

translation.en: Had to look that one up.
translation.zh: 要查一查这是什么奖

translation.en: And a Purple Heart.
translation.zh: 还有紫心勋章

translation.en: He spent the bulk of his service
translation.zh: 大部分服役时间都是在宪兵队度过的

translation.en: in the Military Police.
translation.zh: 大部分服役时间都是在宪兵队度过的 根据各种传言 是个杰出的特工

translation.en: By all accounts, a brilliant investigator.
translation.zh: 根据各种传言 是个杰出的特工 显然也是个麻烦制造者

translation.en: Apparently, a troublemaker, too.
translation.zh: 显然也是个麻烦制造者

translation.en: Demoted to Captain. Worked his way back to Major.
translation.zh: 被降职为上尉 后来又升到了上校

translation.en: Then two years ago, he musters out.
translation.zh: 两年前他申请退役 在部队里度过了大部分的时间

translation.en: After a literal lifetime in the military,
translation.zh: 在部队里度过了大部分的时间

translation.en: he just up and quits. And then, for only the second time in his life,
translation.zh: 又突然退伍 然后第二次进入美国

translation.en: he enters the United States and simply disappears.
translation.zh: 又突然退伍 然后第二次进入美国 之后就人间蒸发了 当铺

translation.en: RODIN: Dead, maybe?
translation.zh: 死了或许 根据社保和弗吉尼亚银行账户信息看

translation.en: EMERSON: Not according to Social Security
translation.zh: 根据社保和弗吉尼亚银行账户信息看

translation.en: and a bank account in Virginia.
translation.zh: 他的退休金按月存入

translation.en: His pension is deposited monthly
translation.zh: 他的退休金按月存入 有人通过银行转账把钱取走

translation.en: and someone is making the occasional withdrawal.
translation.zh: 有人通过银行转账把钱取走

translation.en: All wire transfers.
translation.zh: 西联银行

translation.en: I can't find out where without a federal warrant.
translation.zh: 没有联邦搜查令 无法查出在哪取钱

translation.en: RODIN: Well, he can't drive or fly.
translation.zh: 他不开车 也不开飞机 起码没用真名开过

translation.en: At least not under his real name.
translation.zh: 起码没用真名开过

translation.en: Any warrants? EMERSON: Record's clean.
translation.zh: -有拘捕令吗？ -没有犯罪记录

translation.en: Oh, come on! A guy this hard to find?
translation.zh: 不会吧 这么难找的人？

translation.en: Gotta be wanted for something.
translation.zh: 一定能找到理由通缉他 他没有任何犯罪记录

translation.en: His record is clean.
translation.zh: 他没有任何犯罪记录

translation.en: So,
translation.zh: 那么

translation.en: how do we find this Reacher?
translation.zh: 怎么才能找到这个雷彻？ 你无法找到 除非他想让你找到他

translation.en: Obviously, you don't find this guy unless he wants to be found.
translation.zh: 你无法找到 除非他想让你找到他

translation.en: Excuse me, sir.
translation.zh: 打扰一下 长官 有个叫杰克 雷彻的人想见你

translation.en: There's a Jack Reacher here to see you.
translation.zh: 有个叫杰克 雷彻的人想见你

translation.en: Can I help you?
translation.zh: 你有什么事吗？

translation.en: James Barr.
translation.zh: 詹姆斯 巴尔

translation.en: So, now you've seen him. How do you know him?
translation.zh: 好了 你见过他了 你们怎么认识的？

translation.en: Why wasn't he in protective custody?
translation.zh: 为什么不对他实行保护性监禁？

translation.en: That was an oversight.
translation.zh: 是工作疏忽 是监狱里的势利小人把他扔进了狼窝

translation.en: More like some Corrections flunky threw him to the wolves.
translation.zh: 是监狱里的势利小人把他扔进了狼窝

translation.en: EMERSON: Just as likely.
translation.zh: 好像是这样 可事到如今 已经无法挽回了

translation.en: But it's done and we can't undo it.
translation.zh: 可事到如今 已经无法挽回了

translation.en: So what happens now?
translation.zh: 现在怎么样了？

translation.en: Well, now he's in a coma.
translation.zh: 他昏迷不醒

translation.en: We'll try him when he wakes up. If he wakes up.
translation.zh: 如果他能醒过来 我们要审判他 好了 该你谈谈了 雷彻

translation.en: Okay? Now it's your turn, Reacher.
translation.zh: 好了 该你谈谈了 雷彻

translation.en: Why did he call you as a witness?
translation.zh: 他为什么要你做证人？

translation.en: I don't believe he did.
translation.zh: 我不相信他会这么做 他指名道姓要你来

translation.en: Well, I believe he asked for you by name.
translation.zh: 他指名道姓要你来

translation.en: Any chance I could look at the evidence?
translation.zh: 我能看一下证据吗？ 你先回答几个问题再说

translation.en: No way. Not till you answer some questions.
translation.zh: 你先回答几个问题再说

translation.en: Nice meeting you. Hey. Hey. Hey! Mr. Reacher.
translation.zh: -很高兴认识你 -站住 雷彻先生

translation.en: Mr. Reacher! Hey, stop! Stop right there!
translation.zh: 站在原地别动 我们有言在先

translation.en: We had a deal.
translation.zh: 我带你去见巴尔

translation.en: I take you to Barr, you tell me what you know.
translation.zh: 而你告诉我你了解的情况 你说他射杀了五个人

translation.en: I know you say he shot five people,
translation.zh: 你说他射杀了五个人 可他昏迷不醒

translation.en: I know he's in a coma. I know there's a bus station three miles away
translation.zh: 有个公交车站 我用24分钟就走到那

translation.en: and I can walk there in 24 minutes.
translation.zh: 有个公交车站 我用24分钟就走到那 你要放弃你的朋友？

translation.en: So you're just going to walk out on your friend?
translation.zh: 你要放弃你的朋友？

translation.en: He's not my friend.
translation.zh: 他不是我的朋友 那他为什么会要求你来？

translation.en: RODIN: Why'd he ask for you, then?
translation.zh: 跟他杀死五个人是一个原因

translation.en: Well, same reason he shot five people, he's crazy.
translation.zh: 跟他杀死五个人是一个原因 -他疯了 别拦着我 -等一下

translation.en: Hey. Hold on.
translation.zh: -他疯了 别拦着我 -等一下

translation.en: Don't do that. HELEN: Well, this is a new low, even for both of you.
translation.zh: 你们俩这么做太卑鄙了

translation.en: Uh-oh.
translation.zh: 没有我在场

translation.en: You do not talk to my client without me present.
translation.zh: 你们不能和我的委托人谈话 你们是知道的

translation.en: You know that. RODIN: We weren't talking to your client.
translation.zh: 我们没有和他谈话

translation.en: He's in a coma, for Christ's sakes.
translation.zh: 他处在昏迷之中 你是巴尔的律师？

translation.en: You're Barr's attorney? Helen Rodin, Jack Reacher.
translation.zh: 海伦 罗丁 杰克 雷彻 -杰克 雷彻？ -海伦 罗丁？

translation.en: Jack Reacher? Helen Rodin.
translation.zh: -杰克 雷彻？ -海伦 罗丁？ 对 她是检察官的女儿

translation.en: Yeah, she's the District Attorney's daughter.
translation.zh: 对 她是检察官的女儿

translation.en: It's a good story, actually.
translation.zh: -这事说来话长 -我很想听一听

translation.en: I'd like to hear it.
translation.zh: 你是怎么找到他的？

translation.en: How'd you find him? How'd they find you?
translation.zh: 他们是怎么找到你的？ 你不能和这个人谈话

translation.en: You can't be talking to this man.
translation.zh: 你不能和这个人谈话

translation.en: Two strikes in one day.
translation.zh: -不是你想的那样 -是他找上门的

translation.en: It's not what it looks like. He came to us.
translation.zh: -不是你想的那样 -是他找上门的 你见了检察官？

translation.en: You went to the D.A.? Is there a law against that?
translation.zh: 这样做违法吗？ 目前你还没有违法

translation.en: None you're currently breaking.
translation.zh: 行啦 别把大家搞得下不了台

translation.en: Come on, before this gets awkward. Now, hey.
translation.zh: 行啦 别把大家搞得下不了台 快说 “法庭上见”

translation.en: Say, "See you in court." For me.
translation.zh: 快说 “法庭上见”

translation.en: Goodbye, Detective.
translation.zh: 再见 探员

translation.en: Weird meeting you. Likewise.
translation.zh: 很高兴认识你 我也是 走吧

translation.en: So, you're Jack Reacher.
translation.zh: 你就是杰克 雷彻啊

translation.en: So you're the D.A.'s daughter.
translation.zh: -你是检察官的女儿吧 -上帝呀

translation.en: Oh, Jesus. Please.
translation.zh: 这种工作关系合法吗？

translation.en: Is that even legal? Fortunately.
translation.zh: 所幸是合法的 怎么会有这样的安排？

translation.en: How does that happen?
translation.zh: 你宣誓作证之后再告诉你

translation.en: I'll tell you after deposition.
translation.zh: 别让我宣誓作证

translation.en: You don't want to depose me. Oh, well, you're my only defense witness. I'm not a defense witness.
translation.zh: -你是被告证人 -我不是

translation.en: Your friend James thinks you are.
translation.zh: 你的朋友詹姆斯认为你是 为什么所有人都认为他是我朋友？

translation.en: He's not my friend. Why does everyone assume that?
translation.zh: 为什么所有人都认为他是我朋友？ 他要求见你 你来帮助他

translation.en: Well, why else would he ask for you
translation.zh: 他要求见你 你来帮助他

translation.en: and why would you come here to help him? I didn't come here to help him. I came here to bury him.
translation.zh: 我不是来帮助他 是来埋葬他的

translation.en: Linsky. Who the hell is Jack Reacher?
translation.zh: 林斯基 杰克 雷彻是什么人？

translation.en: HELEN: So why are you so hard to find?
translation.zh: 你为什么这么难找？

translation.en: I'm impossible to find.
translation.zh: 是不可能找到我 为什么？

translation.en: Why is that? Well, you could say it started out as an exercise and became an addiction.
translation.zh: 这么说吧 这是我的职业习惯

translation.en: Are you on the run?
translation.zh: 你在逃亡吗？

translation.en: My bus is leaving. You better hurry, counselor.
translation.zh: 我的车要开了 快点吧 律师

translation.en: How do you know James Barr?
translation.zh: 你是怎么认识巴尔的？

translation.en: Why are you representing him?
translation.zh: -你为什么要替他辩护？ -我是律师

translation.en: I'm a lawyer. So is a public defender, with just as much chance of clearing Barr.
translation.zh: 公共辩护人也有机会证明他无罪

translation.en: I'm not trying to clear him,
translation.zh: 我并不是想证明他无罪 而是要他不被判死刑

translation.en: I am just trying to keep him off death row.
translation.zh: 而是要他不被判死刑

translation.en: By proving he's insane? Well, that's one option.
translation.zh: 你想证明他精神失常？ 这是一种选择 跟你爸爸作对

translation.en: And sticking it to your father because...
translation.zh: 跟你爸爸作对

translation.en: No. Not my father.
translation.zh: 不是他 是地方检察官办公室

translation.en: The Office of the District Attorney.
translation.zh: 不是他 是地方检察官办公室 因为地方检察官办公室 从未承认你是淑女？

translation.en: Because the Office of the District Attorney never bought you a pony.
translation.zh: 因为地方检察官办公室 从未承认你是淑女？

translation.en: D.A. Rodin's never lost a capital case. You know why?
translation.zh: 罗丁检察官从未打输过死刑的案件 知道为什么吗？

translation.en: Impeccable tailoring.
translation.zh: 政客都爱仗势欺人 他从来不接打不赢的案子

translation.en: He never picks a fight he can't win.
translation.zh: 知己知彼

translation.en: Worked for the Red Baron. Every murder suspect in this town is given a choice.
translation.zh: 每个谋杀嫌疑犯都有两个选择

translation.en: Confess or face death.
translation.zh: 认罪或面对死刑

translation.en: Against a D.A. who never loses.
translation.zh: 和从未输过的检察官打官司 我的律师事务所认为即使无罪的人

translation.en: My firm has reason to believe more than one innocent man has gone down without a fight.
translation.zh: 我的律师事务所认为即使无罪的人 都会毫不抵抗就认罪伏法

translation.en: Oh, I get it.
translation.zh: 我明白了 你是个理想主义者

translation.en: No. I'm a pacifist.
translation.zh: 不 我是和平主义者

translation.en: It's a noble crusade.
translation.zh: 想废除死刑是高尚行为 但这次你打不赢 相信我

translation.en: But this is not the fight. Trust me. James Barr's guilty.
translation.zh: 但这次你打不赢 相信我 詹姆斯 巴尔有罪 你还没有看证据呢

translation.en: Is this a privileged conversation?
translation.zh: 这是保密谈话吗？ 对 是对诉讼委托人的谈话

translation.en: Of course, it's a client conference.
translation.zh: 对 是对诉讼委托人的谈话 你说的每一句话都不能转述

translation.en: Nothing you say here can be repeated.
translation.zh: 你说的每一句话都不能转述

translation.en: There are four types of people who join the military.
translation.zh: 有四种人会参军 一些是为家族荣誉

translation.en: For some, it's a family trade.
translation.zh: 有四种人会参军 一些是为家族荣誉 另一些人是爱国者 渴望为国效劳

translation.en: Others are patriots, eager to serve.
translation.zh: 另一些人是爱国者 渴望为国效劳 再一类人是为了找一份工作

translation.en: Next, you have those who just need a job.
translation.zh: 再一类人是为了找一份工作 最后一类是想要一种合法的杀人方式

translation.en: Then there's the kind who want a legal means of killing other people.
translation.zh: 最后一类是想要一种合法的杀人方式

translation.en: James Barr was one of those.
translation.zh: 詹姆斯 巴尔就是这种人

translation.en: He made sniper.
translation.zh: 他当上了狙击手 刻苦训练

translation.en: Trained hard. Two thousand rounds a week.
translation.zh: 一周射击2000次 每枪都要求射中人的脑门

translation.en: And with every shot, he's taught to visualize
translation.zh: 每枪都要求射中人的脑门

translation.en: the base of a man's skull through his reticle.
translation.zh: 每枪都要求射中人的脑门 一枪毙命的地方就是大脑

translation.en: The sweet spot where the medulla meets the spine.
translation.zh: 一枪毙命的地方就是大脑

translation.en: Visualize that puff of pink mist.
translation.zh: 出血少 死得快

translation.en: (CLICKS) Finally, he's deployed to Iraq.
translation.zh: 他终于被派往伊拉克

translation.en: He's put on overwatch.
translation.zh: 安排他去掩护射击组 日复一日 他通过瞄准镜盯着平民

translation.en: All day long he stares through a scope at civilians.
translation.zh: 日复一日 他通过瞄准镜盯着平民

translation.en: Women.
translation.zh: 女人 孩子

translation.en: Day in, day out, for two long years without ever once being cleared to fire a single shot.
translation.zh: 两年间 没接过一次枪击指令

translation.en: Then comes the drawdown.
translation.zh: 后来开始撤军

translation.en: For James Barr, the war's over.
translation.zh: 对詹姆斯 巴尔来说战争结束了

translation.en: Two thousand rounds a week.
translation.zh: 一周射击2000次

translation.en: A quarter million rounds in his career,
translation.zh: 他职业生涯中共射击25万次

translation.en: not one at a human target.
translation.zh: 竟没有一枪是真人做靶子

translation.en: You've been hungry. You've been horny.
translation.zh: 人处于饥饿之中 会饥不择食 身上痒痒又挠不着

translation.en: You've had an itch you can't scratch.
translation.zh: 身上痒痒又挠不着 想想有多难受 天天如此 年年如此

translation.en: Imagine that feeling. Days. Weeks. Years.
translation.zh: 想想有多难受 天天如此 年年如此 这种难受要经历25万次

translation.en: Imagine that feeling times 200,000, plus 50,000 more.
translation.zh: 这种难受要经历25万次 设想一下 在54度高温下站岗

translation.en: Imagine it's 130 degrees on the deck
translation.zh: 设想一下 在54度高温下站岗

translation.en: and tomorrow you're going home
translation.zh: 明天就要回家 知道吗？ 如果你现在不挠痒痒

translation.en: and you know if you don't scratch that itch now,
translation.zh: 如果你现在不挠痒痒

translation.en: you never will.
translation.zh: 就永远挠不了

translation.en: You need a release.
translation.zh: 需要发泄一下 需要一个目标

translation.en: You need a target. And the who of it never once enters your mind.
translation.zh: 而他的大脑从未有过明确目标

translation.en: He covered his tracks well,
translation.zh: 他隐蔽得非常好 跟神志清醒的人一样

translation.en: just like sane people do.
translation.zh: 跟神志清醒的人一样

translation.en: He almost got away with it, too.
translation.zh: 他差一点就要躲过惩罚

translation.en: But I caught him. And he confessed.
translation.zh: 可我抓到了他 事实面前他认了罪

translation.en: So why didn't he go to prison?
translation.zh: 那他为什么没有进监狱？ 巴尔不知道他射杀的安保人员

translation.en: What Barr didn't know that day was the four civilian contractors he'd picked off
translation.zh: 巴尔不知道他射杀的安保人员 是参加过集体强奸晚会的人

translation.en: just spent the weekend at what they call a rape-rally.
translation.zh: 是参加过集体强奸晚会的人 28个女人 从11岁到54岁

translation.en: It was 28 women, ages 54 on down to 11.
translation.zh: 28个女人 从11岁到54岁 这些人是我在结案前找到的

translation.en: Those were just the ones I could find before the case was shut down.
translation.zh: 这些人是我在结案前找到的 挖得越深 越令人发指

translation.en: See, the deeper I dug, the uglier it got.
translation.zh: 挖得越深 越令人发指 七年 伟大的任务之后

translation.en: And after seven long years of "Mission Accomplished,"
translation.zh: 七年 伟大的任务之后 安保公司的人想让这件事悄悄结束

translation.en: someone in the corporation just wanted the whole thing to end quietly.
translation.zh: 安保公司的人想让这件事悄悄结束

translation.en: So they chalked it up to the fog of war,
translation.zh: 把此案归结为战争导致人精神失常 让杀人犯一走了之

translation.en: made the murders go away.
translation.zh: 让杀人犯一走了之 这是绝密信息 所以是保密谈话

translation.en: This is classified information. And that's why the privilege.
translation.zh: 这是绝密信息 所以是保密谈话

translation.en: But you were ready to tell this to the D.A.
translation.zh: 但你可以把这些告诉检察官 我上次见到巴尔时

translation.en: The last time I saw Barr, I made him a promise.
translation.zh: 我上次见到巴尔时 向他做过承诺 当我看到这个消息 就过来兑现承诺

translation.en: And when I saw his name on the news, I came here to keep it.
translation.zh: 当我看到这个消息 就过来兑现承诺

translation.en: But now I know I don't have to.
translation.zh: 现在知道不用这么做了 你怎能肯定？

translation.en: You still haven't seen the evidence.
translation.zh: 你还没有看过证据

translation.en: Your father has.
translation.zh: 你父亲看过了 他不会接打不赢的官司

translation.en: And he doesn't pick a fight he can't win.
translation.zh: 他不会接打不赢的官司 巴尔不会再逃脱杀人的罪名

translation.en: Barr's not getting away with murder again.
translation.zh: 巴尔不会再逃脱杀人的罪名

translation.en: He might.
translation.zh: 也许能

translation.en: He suffered a severe brain injury in state custody.
translation.zh: 在监狱里 他的大脑受到严重损伤 如果他能醒来

translation.en: When he wakes up, if he wakes up,
translation.zh: 如果他能醒来 可能会不记得这件事

translation.en: he may not remember the event,
translation.zh: 可能会不记得这件事 或什么都不记得

translation.en: he may not remember anything at all.
translation.zh: 或什么都不记得

translation.en: And this case won't be about James Barr's guilt or innocence.
translation.zh: 这个案子不是巴尔有罪或无罪 而是他能否接受审判

translation.en: It'll be about his ability to stand trial.
translation.zh: 而是他能否接受审判

translation.en: After everything I just told you,
translation.zh: 我把一切都告诉了你 你还想为他辩护吗？

translation.en: you still want to defend him?
translation.zh: 你还想为他辩护吗？ 我想看到他受到公正的审判

translation.en: I want to see he gets a fair trial.
translation.zh: 我想看到他受到公正的审判

translation.en: You said he confessed in Baghdad.
translation.zh: 你说过他在巴格达已认罪了

translation.en: He didn't confess this time.
translation.zh: 这次他可没认罪 -这次他作的孽更多 -他要求见你

translation.en: This time he knows better. This time he asked for you.
translation.zh: -这次他作的孽更多 -他要求见你

translation.en: I want to know why.
translation.zh: 我想知道为什么 你也想知道为什么 我看出你很纠结

translation.en: You want to know why. I can see it's eating you.
translation.zh: 你也想知道为什么 我看出你很纠结

translation.en: And you can't ask Barr,
translation.zh: 你无法问巴尔 检察官又不让你看证据

translation.en: and the D.A. won't let you see the evidence.
translation.zh: 检察官又不让你看证据

translation.en: My lead investigator has complete access to the evidence. All of it.
translation.zh: 我的首席调查员可以看那些证据

translation.en: So where's your lead investigator? About to catch a bus out of town.
translation.zh: -你的首席调查员在哪儿？ -他就要出城了

translation.en: Thanks for the coffee, counselor.
translation.zh: 谢谢你的咖啡 律师

translation.en: You understand you're not just asking me to look at the evidence.
translation.zh: 你要明白 你不仅让我看证据 还要让我看那个冷血杀手

translation.en: You're asking me to look at a cold-blooded killer.
translation.zh: 还要让我看那个冷血杀手

translation.en: A man I know to be guilty.
translation.zh: 我知道他有罪 即使你不想看到他被判死刑

translation.en: A man you want to keep off death row.
translation.zh: 即使你不想看到他被判死刑 而你要求我客观地看待他

translation.en: And you're asking me to look at him objectively.
translation.zh: 而你要求我客观地看待他

translation.en: Yes, that is what I'm asking.
translation.zh: 是的 这就是我的要求

translation.en: I'll do it. On one condition. Name it.
translation.zh: -案子我接了 但有一个条件 -说吧

translation.en: You have to look at the victims objectively.
translation.zh: 你必须客观地看待受害者

translation.en: How do you suggest I do that?
translation.zh: 你想我怎么做？

translation.en: Yes? Mr. Farrior?
translation.zh: -谁？ -法里奥尔先生吗？ 我是海伦 罗丁 我们通过电话

translation.en: I'm Helen Rodin. We spoke on the phone.
translation.zh: 我是海伦 罗丁 我们通过电话

translation.en: Of course. You said you're defending the man that ki... That man.
translation.zh: 是的 你要为那个人辩护

translation.en: HELEN: I represent James Barr, yes.
translation.zh: 我要做詹姆斯 巴尔的辩护律师

translation.en: FARRIOR: And you have questions about my daughter?
translation.zh: 你要问关于我女儿的问题吗？

translation.en: HELEN: I do.
translation.zh: -是的 -什么目的？

translation.en: FARRIOR: What for?
translation.zh: 我希望了解受害者是什么人

translation.en: I was hoping to get a better sense of who the victims were as...
translation.zh: 我希望了解受害者是什么人 就是说 他们是什么样的人

translation.en: That is to say, who they were as people. As human beings. (SCOFFS)
translation.zh: 就是说 他们是什么样的人

translation.en: That's a bit unusual, considering your position, isn't it?
translation.zh: 考虑到你的地位 这不正常 是不是？

translation.en: That is true.
translation.zh: 说得对 通常情况下 处在我这个地位的人

translation.en: Normally someone in my position would want the jury
translation.zh: 通常情况下 处在我这个地位的人 应该让陪审团知道的越少越好

translation.en: to know as little as possible about the...
translation.zh: 应该让陪审团知道的越少越好 你的当事人杀了那么多人 冷酷无情

translation.en: FARRIOR: The people that your client killed.
translation.zh: 你的当事人杀了那么多人 冷酷无情

translation.en: Have you spoken with the other families?
translation.zh: 你和其他家庭的人谈过了吗？ 是的 有几个人愿意和我谈

translation.en: Yeah, some. The ones who would speak with me.
translation.zh: 是的 有几个人愿意和我谈

translation.en: Come in.
translation.zh: -进来吧 -谢谢

translation.en: FARRIOR: Chrissie was a nanny. She had a little girl with her that day.
translation.zh: 克里希是个保姆 那天她领着小女孩

translation.en: Yes, I know.
translation.zh: 是的 我知道

translation.en: Are you gonna go talk with that child?
translation.zh: 你要和那孩子谈谈吗？

translation.en: No, of course not. I...
translation.zh: -不 当然不会 -为什么不谈？

translation.en: Why not? Well, I think it would be... Insensitive?
translation.zh: 我认为有点太残酷

translation.en: Inappropriate?
translation.zh: 不合适

translation.en: Everything that you want to know about my daughter
translation.zh: 你想知道 关于我女儿的材料

translation.en: is right here. The Gazette did a nice piece on her.
translation.zh: 都在这儿 报上对她作了全面报道

translation.en: Her obituary does the rest.
translation.zh: 她的讣告上做了其它说明

translation.en: Thank you. I'll definitely have a look.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我一定好好看

translation.en: You a good attorney, Miss Rodin?
translation.zh: 你是个好律师吗 罗丁小姐？

translation.en: That's not really for me to...
translation.zh: -我真不应该 -别打岔

translation.en: answer the question.
translation.zh: 直接回答问题

translation.en: Yes, I suppose I am pretty good.
translation.zh: 是的 我认为自己是个优秀律师 优秀得足以能让巴尔免除死刑？

translation.en: Good enough to keep that man off death row?
translation.zh: 优秀得足以能让巴尔免除死刑？

translation.en: You know,
translation.zh: 我想 也许我该走了

translation.en: I think maybe I should go.
translation.zh: 我想 也许我该走了 待在原地别动

translation.en: That man deserves to die, Miss Rodin.
translation.zh: 那个人死有余辜 罗丁小姐

translation.en: Why would you defend him?
translation.zh: 你为什么要为他辩护？ 我犯了严重的错误

translation.en: I can see that I have made a terrible mistake.
translation.zh: 我犯了严重的错误

translation.en: And I'm very, very sorry
translation.zh: 非常抱歉 我保证再也不来打扰您

translation.en: and I promise I won't bother you again.
translation.zh: 我保证再也不来打扰您

translation.en: (GASPS)
translation.zh: 爸爸

translation.en: What the hell are you doing?
translation.zh: -你在干什么？ -我在 怎么了？

translation.en: What am I... What?
translation.zh: 是真的吗？

translation.en: Is it true? You're talking to the victims' families? You? Alone?
translation.zh: 你和受害者的家人谈话？你一个人？

translation.en: How do you know that? How did you find me here?
translation.zh: -你怎么知道的？ -我是地方检察官

translation.en: I'm the District Attorney. It's my business to know.
translation.zh: 了解情况是我的工作

translation.en: That's not an answer.
translation.zh: 这不是回答问题

translation.en: Oh. Well, you're not the only one
translation.zh: 好了 你不是能力超强的调查员

translation.en: with crack investigators, Helen.
translation.zh: 好了 你不是能力超强的调查员 对了 我知道雷彻的情况

translation.en: That's right. I know about Reacher.
translation.zh: 对了 我知道雷彻的情况 你的首席调查员是失踪两年的老兵

translation.en: Your lead investigator is a war veteran who's been missing for the last two years.
translation.zh: 你的首席调查员是失踪两年的老兵

translation.en: How can you vouch for his state of mind?
translation.zh: 你怎么能确保他情绪稳定？ 并相信他 告诉你的一切

translation.en: How can you trust anything he tells you?
translation.zh: 并相信他 告诉你的一切

translation.en: You don't know the man.
translation.zh: 你根本不了解他 告诉我

translation.en: Tell me this,
translation.zh: 他知道你不能付他报酬吗？

translation.en: does he know you can't pay him?
translation.zh: 他知道你不能付他报酬吗？ 你的律师事务所不想接这个案子

translation.en: That your own firm didn't want this case?
translation.zh: 你的律师事务所不想接这个案子 没人愿意接这个案子

translation.en: That nobody wants this case?
translation.zh: 没人愿意接这个案子

translation.en: You never even spoke to your client before he wound up in a coma.
translation.zh: 在你的委托人醒来之前 你从未和他谈过话 听我说 听着

translation.en: Oh, now listen to me! Listen.
translation.zh: 你从未和他谈过话 听我说 听着 我是作为你的父亲和你说话

translation.en: Listen, I'm speaking as your father.
translation.zh: 我是作为你的父亲和你说话

translation.en: Whatever our differences have been in the past,
translation.zh: 无论我们之间有什么分歧

translation.en: you gotta listen to me now.
translation.zh: 你都应该听我的

translation.en: You're making a terrible mistake.
translation.zh: 你犯了一个严重的错误

translation.en: You cannot win this case.
translation.zh: 你赢不了这场官司

translation.en: You're going to ruin your career.
translation.zh: 你会毁掉自己的前途

translation.en: Why? For what?
translation.zh: 为什么 为什么 为了伤害我吗？

translation.en: To hurt me? To change me? Helen... Don't touch me!
translation.zh: -为了改变我？海伦 -别碰我

translation.en: REACHER: Thanks for letting me take a look.
translation.zh: 谢谢你让我来参观

translation.en: Hey. We love it when friends of the accused
translation.zh: 我们喜欢被告的朋友 把我们的工作贬得一无是处

translation.en: try to tear our work to shreds.
translation.zh: 把我们的工作贬得一无是处

translation.en: He's not my friend.
translation.zh: 他不是我的朋友 你接着说 发现什么漏洞了吗？

translation.en: So you keep saying. Find any holes?
translation.zh: 你接着说 发现什么漏洞了吗？ 你们没必要让他住进医院

translation.en: Well, you didn't have to put him in the hospital.
translation.zh: 你们没必要让他住进医院

translation.en: Other than that, damn fine police work.
translation.zh: 除此之外 警察的工作干得很漂亮

translation.en: It's open and shut.
translation.zh: 结案并不难

translation.en: What can I say? The scene was a gold mine.
translation.zh: 我能说什么呢 犯罪现场是座金矿

translation.en: Come on. Now we both know gold's only as good as the man digging.
translation.zh: 我们都知道只有高手才能挖到金子 你想来随时都可以

translation.en: Yeah, well, anytime you want to come back, take a look at this stuff...
translation.zh: 你想来随时都可以

translation.en: No, thanks. Don't need to.
translation.zh: 不 谢谢 没这个必要

translation.en: You never took any notes.
translation.zh: -你从来不记笔记 -没必要记

translation.en: (CHUCKLING) So you were some real hot shit in the Army, huh?
translation.zh: 你可真是军队里的大能人

translation.en: I did all right.
translation.zh: 我干得还行吧 军队都干些什么？

translation.en: So what does an Army cop do mostly?
translation.zh: 军队都干些什么？

translation.en: Break up bar fights?
translation.zh: 给酒吧斗殴的人劝架？ 我和你做的事大体一样

translation.en: I did what you do pretty much, with one minor difference.
translation.zh: 我和你做的事大体一样 -只有一点区别 -什么区别？

translation.en: Every suspect was a trained killer.
translation.zh: 每个嫌疑犯都是训练有素的杀手

translation.en: Thanks again.
translation.zh: 再次谢谢你

translation.en: Why do you think he paid for parking?
translation.zh: 你认为他为什么要付费停车？

translation.en: Pardon?
translation.zh: 你说什么？ 他向陌生的人射6发子弹

translation.en: He's about to fire six shots into a crowd of strangers.
translation.zh: 他向陌生的人射6发子弹

translation.en: And he's worried about the meter maid?
translation.zh: 却担心女抄表员给他罚单？ 精神病 解释不通吗？

translation.en: "Simple loony" won't do it for you?
translation.zh: 精神病 解释不通吗？ 我喜欢另外一个推理

translation.en: I like to have at least one alternate theory.
translation.zh: 我喜欢另外一个推理

translation.en: Habit.
translation.zh: 习惯 肌肉记忆

translation.en: I don't think he knew he was doing it.
translation.zh: 他不知道自己在做这种事

translation.en: Like I said, it's damn fine work.
translation.zh: -我说过了 干得真漂亮 -大兵

translation.en: What's the serial number on the rifle?
translation.zh: 步枪上面的序列号是多少？

translation.en: What's the date on the quarter?
translation.zh: 硬币上面的年份是哪一年？

translation.en: Forest for the trees, Detective.
translation.zh: 只见树木 不见森林 探员

translation.en: Forest for the trees.
translation.zh: 只见树木 不见森林

translation.en: Mind if I share your table? I'm Sandy.
translation.zh: 和你坐一会不介意吧 我叫桑迪

translation.en: So was I. Last week.
translation.zh: 沙地 我上周去过沙地

translation.en: On a beach, in Florida.
translation.zh: 弗罗里达的 海滩上

translation.en: What's your name?
translation.zh: 你叫什么名字？

translation.en: Jimmie Reese.
translation.zh: 吉米 瑞斯

translation.en: You don't look like a Jimmie.
translation.zh: 你看上去不像叫吉米的

translation.en: What do I look like?
translation.zh: 那你觉得我叫什么？

translation.en: I don't know. But not a Jimmie.
translation.zh: 不知道 但不像吉米

translation.en: So you're new in town?
translation.zh: -你是新来的吧 -算是吧

translation.en: It's kind of loud in here.
translation.zh: 这里太吵了 你也许想去静一点的地方

translation.en: Do you want to maybe go someplace quieter? I have a car.
translation.zh: 你也许想去静一点的地方 -我有车 -你到法定驾驶年龄了吗？

translation.en: You're old enough to drive?
translation.zh: -我有车 -你到法定驾驶年龄了吗？

translation.en: I'm old enough to do a lot of things.
translation.zh: 我到了能做很多事情的年龄

translation.en: I'm on a budget, Sandy.
translation.zh: 我在节省开支 桑迪

translation.en: What? I can't afford you.
translation.zh: -什么？ -我买不起你

translation.en: I'm not a hooker.
translation.zh: 我不是妓女

translation.en: Oh, then I really can't afford you.
translation.zh: 我真的没钱和你处朋友 老实说 我在汽车配件商店上班

translation.en: Seriously, I work at the auto parts store.
translation.zh: 老实说 我在汽车配件商店上班

translation.en: What I mean is, the cheapest woman tends to be the one you pay for.
translation.zh: 我是说 妓女还更明码实价呢

translation.en: I am not a hooker!
translation.zh: -我不是妓女 -我不过开个玩笑

translation.en: No. A hooker would get the joke.
translation.zh: -我不是妓女 -我不过开个玩笑 -这是在干什么？ -他说我是妓女

translation.en: MAN: What's this? He called me a whore.
translation.zh: -这是在干什么？ -他说我是妓女

translation.en: Is that true?
translation.zh: 这是真的吗？

translation.en: Well, nobody said whore.
translation.zh: 没有人说她是 她自己说的

translation.en: She inferred hooker, but I meant slut.
translation.zh: 没有人说她是 她自己说的 我不过说她是荡妇

translation.en: Hey. That's our sister. Is she a good kisser?
translation.zh: -喂 她可是我们的妹妹 -她是接吻高手吗？

translation.en: Hey. Outside. Pay your check first.
translation.zh: -出去 -先把账单付了

translation.en: I'll pay later. You won't be able to.
translation.zh: -我一会再付 -一会就付不了了

translation.en: You think?
translation.zh: 你这样想吗？

translation.en: All the time. You should try it.
translation.zh: 一向这样认为 你试试看

translation.en: It's a great joke, but I'm going to beat your ass.
translation.zh: 我要狠狠揍你一顿 你想在这里打 还是在外面

translation.en: Do you want to do that here or outside?
translation.zh: 你想在这里打 还是在外面

translation.en: Outside.
translation.zh: 外面

translation.en: Stay here, Sandy.
translation.zh: 待在这里 桑迪

translation.en: I don't mind the sight of blood.
translation.zh: 我不怕看见血

translation.en: When it means you're not pregnant, anyway.
translation.zh: 看见出血 证明你还没当妈

translation.en: You still think you're funny now, creep?
translation.zh: 你还以为自己很搞笑吗 傻瓜？ 闭嘴 桑迪 没人跟你说话

translation.en: Shut your mouth, Sandy! No one is talking to you.
translation.zh: 闭嘴 桑迪 没人跟你说话

translation.en: It's your last chance to walk away.
translation.zh: 你现在走还来得及

translation.en: Are you kidding? It's five against one.
translation.zh: 你在开玩笑吗？这是五对一

translation.en: It's three against one.
translation.zh: -是三对一 -你不识数吗？

translation.en: How do you figure?
translation.zh: -是三对一 -你不识数吗？ 我只要先打倒你

translation.en: Well, once I take out the leader, which is you,
translation.zh: 我只要先打倒你 我就能轻易解决那两个跟屁虫

translation.en: I'll have to contend with one or two enthusiastic wingmen.
translation.zh: 我就能轻易解决那两个跟屁虫

translation.en: The last two guys, they always run.
translation.zh: 最后两个人就会逃之夭夭

translation.en: Oh, you, uh, you've done this before?
translation.zh: 你以前干过这种事？

translation.en: It's getting late.
translation.zh: 天不早了

translation.en: Remember, you wanted this.
translation.zh: 记住 是你自找的

translation.en: It's okay. You're okay.
translation.zh: 好了 你完蛋了 起来

translation.en: Okay. Now we know who's who.
translation.zh: 现在知道谁是跟屁虫了

translation.en: Let's get this done.
translation.zh: 我们把仗打完吧

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 还想打吗？

translation.en: On the ground! That's a pretty impressive response time, fellas.
translation.zh: 趴在地上 伙计们反应也太神速了

translation.en: COP 1: Do it!
translation.zh: 趴下

translation.en: COP 2: Hands behind your back.
translation.zh: 双手放在背后

translation.en: Who hired you?
translation.zh: -是谁雇你来的？ -走吧

translation.en: Hey, Helen. HELEN: Am I wearing too much perfume?
translation.zh: -海伦 -我是不是喷了太多的香水？

translation.en: Breathing too sternly. Detective Emerson.
translation.zh: 我有鼻炎 爱默生探员

translation.en: Somebody dead? And if someone is?
translation.zh: -有人死了吗？ -如果死了呢？

translation.en: Then they died of shame. 'Cause I was being gentle.
translation.zh: 那他们也是羞愧至死的 我下手很轻 我现在明白你为什么到处走 雷彻

translation.en: I'm starting to understand why you move around a lot, Reacher.
translation.zh: 我现在明白你为什么到处走 雷彻

translation.en: REACHER: So no one's dead.
translation.zh: 原来没有人死亡

translation.en: One guy likely won't ever walk right again.
translation.zh: 有个小子可能再也走不了路了 -你想起诉我吗？ -很想

translation.en: REACHER: You want to charge me.
translation.zh: -你想起诉我吗？ -很想

translation.en: But no one's pressing. Sadly, no.
translation.zh: -可是没人要告我 -很遗憾 没有

translation.en: Am I free to go?
translation.zh: 那我自由了？爱默生

translation.en: What's that?
translation.zh: -4862681 -那是什么？ 巴尔步枪上面序列号

translation.en: It's the serial number on Barr's rifle.
translation.zh: 巴尔步枪上面序列号

translation.en: You're working for me, do you understand that?
translation.zh: 你在为我工作 知道吗？ 你做的每件事

translation.en: So everything you do is a reflection on my firm. On me.
translation.zh: 你做的每件事 都给我的律师事务所造成恶劣影响

translation.en: I was set up.
translation.zh: -我被人陷害了 -你在和律师说话

translation.en: You're talking to a lawyer. There was this girl.
translation.zh: 有个女孩 她主动找我

translation.en: She came onto me. Picked a fight.
translation.zh: -故意挑起打斗 -这事总发生在酒吧

translation.en: Which never happens in a bar.
translation.zh: -故意挑起打斗 -这事总发生在酒吧 当我告诉她我叫什么名字时 她很吃惊

translation.en: She was thrown when I told her my name.
translation.zh: 当我告诉她我叫什么名字时 她很吃惊 她在等拳王迈克 泰森？

translation.en: She was expecting Mike Tyson?
translation.zh: 她在等拳王迈克 泰森？ 她不相信我是吉米 瑞斯

translation.en: She wasn't expecting Jimmie Reese.
translation.zh: 她不相信我是吉米 瑞斯

translation.en: Yankees second baseman.
translation.zh: 扬基队的二垒手 为什么要说你是扬基队的二垒手？

translation.en: Why did you say you were a Yankees second baseman?
translation.zh: 为什么要说你是扬基队的二垒手？

translation.en: I always use Yankees second basemen.
translation.zh: 我一直使用扬基队二垒手的名字 又没说我就是扬基队的二垒手

translation.en: I didn't say I was a Yankees second baseman, I just said...
translation.zh: 又没说我就是扬基队的二垒手

translation.en: Look, the point is,
translation.zh: 是她想听到杰克 雷彻这个名字

translation.en: she was expecting to hear "Jack Reacher."
translation.zh: 是她想听到杰克 雷彻这个名字 她早就知道我是谁

translation.en: She knew who I was. And the cops were rolling before the fight even started.
translation.zh: 还没打 警察就往这里来了

translation.en: And those five guys are her brothers? Come on.
translation.zh: 这五个小子是她的哥哥 算了吧

translation.en: Someone sent those boys to put me down.
translation.zh: 有人派这几个小子来干掉我

translation.en: HELEN: If someone followed you at the river today,
translation.zh: 如果今天有人跟踪你 可能是警察

translation.en: it was probably a cop. And I highly doubt...
translation.zh: 可能是警察

translation.en: There are three things cops never do.
translation.zh: 有三件事警察从来不做 投民主党的票 开凯迪拉克

translation.en: They don't vote Democrat, they don't drive Cadillacs,
translation.zh: 投民主党的票 开凯迪拉克 或用私人汽车办案

translation.en: and they never use personal vehicles.
translation.zh: 或用私人汽车办案

translation.en: It's not a cop.
translation.zh: 不是警察

translation.en: A P.I., then, or the D.A.'s office.
translation.zh: 私家侦探或检察官办公室的人

translation.en: You think your father's office would set me up?
translation.zh: 你认为你父亲会陷害我？

translation.en: Why would anyone set you up?
translation.zh: 为什么有人要害你？

translation.en: How was your day?
translation.zh: 你有新线索对吧 雷彻 你预计的事发生了

translation.en: It went exactly the way I think you hoped it would.
translation.zh: 雷彻 你预计的事发生了

translation.en: You okay?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: What'd you learn?
translation.zh: 有证据吗？

translation.en: HELEN: Chrissie Farrior was 22.
translation.zh: 克里希 法里奥尔 22岁

translation.en: A nanny caring for the six-year-old daughter of family friends.
translation.zh: 当保姆照顾亲友一个6岁的女儿

translation.en: She'd finally saved enough money for a trip to China,
translation.zh: 她攒够了钱 要去中国旅游 本该一周前启程

translation.en: in fact, she should have left the week before.
translation.zh: 本该一周前启程 可是她照看的小女孩

translation.en: But the girl she cared for wanted Chrissie to stay for her 7th birthday.
translation.zh: 要她留下来和她过7岁生日

translation.en: They'd gone downtown that day to shop for a party dress.
translation.zh: 他们去城里买生日晚会穿的衣服

translation.en: Rita Coronado worked as a cleaning lady at the River Cross Plaza.
translation.zh: 瑞塔 科罗娜多 是十字河购物中心的清洁工人

translation.en: She was usually late for work, but she had a good reason.
translation.zh: 她经常上班迟到 但总有很好的理由

translation.en: Since her son Marco was nine years old
translation.zh: 因为她儿子马可9岁了 她每天要送儿子去学校

translation.en: she had to personally drop him at school to make sure he actually went.
translation.zh: 她每天要送儿子去学校 她的付出得到了回报

translation.en: But her dedication had paid off.
translation.zh: 她的付出得到了回报 马可现在是名优秀学生

translation.en: Marco was now an honor student.
translation.zh: 马可现在是名优秀学生 为奖励儿子的刻苦学习

translation.en: As a reward for all his hard work,
translation.zh: 为奖励儿子的刻苦学习 瑞塔第一次带他去看棒球比赛

translation.en: Rita was taking him to his first baseball game.
translation.zh: 瑞塔第一次带他去看棒球比赛 事发当天下午 她在去买票的路上

translation.en: And she was on her way to pick up the tickets that very afternoon.
translation.zh: 事发当天下午 她在去买票的路上

translation.en: Nancy Holt's last words to her husband were a lie.
translation.zh: 南希霍尔特对她丈夫说的是谎话 -我爱你 -再见

translation.en: I love you, babe. See you! Bye.
translation.zh: -我爱你 -再见 她说要去保养汽车

translation.en: She told him she was taking her car to be serviced,
translation.zh: 她说要去保养汽车

translation.en: but in fact, she was headed downtown.
translation.zh: 却开车去了市中心

translation.en: It's perfect.
translation.zh: 她告诉服务员 不想在信用卡上 留下买过东西的记录

translation.en: She told the clerk she didn't want the purchase showing up on her credit card.
translation.zh: 留下买过东西的记录 她想在结婚十周年纪念日

translation.en: She wanted to surprise her husband for their 10th anniversary
translation.zh: 她想在结婚十周年纪念日 送给丈夫一个惊喜

translation.en: just a few days away. Thank you.
translation.zh: 送给丈夫一个惊喜

translation.en: Oline Archer never liked her husband's construction business,
translation.zh: 奥赖恩 阿彻一直都不喜欢 她丈夫的建筑生意 即使他是国内最大的承包商

translation.en: even after helping him become one of the largest contractors in the county.
translation.zh: 即使他是国内最大的承包商 由于丈夫疾病缠身

translation.en: So it came as a relief when his failing health and a costly lawsuit
translation.zh: 由于丈夫疾病缠身 加上昂贵的诉讼费用 他们被迫把公司卖给了竞争对手

translation.en: were forcing them to sell to the competition.
translation.zh: 他们被迫把公司卖给了竞争对手

translation.en: Help! Help!
translation.zh: 救命啊 救命

translation.en: Her husband had given his life for the company.
translation.zh: 她丈夫把一生都献给了公司

translation.en: But now that it was hers,
translation.zh: 现在公司属于她了 她却不愿卖掉

translation.en: she couldn't bring herself to let it go.
translation.zh: 她却不愿卖掉

translation.en: She was on her way to secure a loan that day
translation.zh: 那天 她为保住她的生意 去办理了抵押贷款

translation.en: so she could keep the business she'd always hated.
translation.zh: 去办理了抵押贷款

translation.en: Darren Sawyer was an investment broker
translation.zh: 达伦 索耶和瑞塔在同一楼里上班 是名投资经纪人

translation.en: in the same building where Rita worked.
translation.zh: 是名投资经纪人 他的妻子说他回家越来越晚

translation.en: His wife said he'd grown increasingly distant of late.
translation.zh: 他的妻子说他回家越来越晚 她不记得上次和丈夫谈话是什么时候

translation.en: She can't remember their last words to one another, but they weren't kind.
translation.zh: 她不记得上次和丈夫谈话是什么时候 但话说的都很难听 达伦的尸体旁有束玫瑰花

translation.en: Darren's body was found beside a fresh bouquet of roses he'd bought that morning
translation.zh: 达伦的尸体旁有束玫瑰花 是他那天早晨买的 让他妻子感到欣慰的是

translation.en: and his wife takes comfort in the fact that, in his last moments, he was most likely thinking of her.
translation.zh: 丈夫在弥留之际还在思念她

translation.en: We're gonna be okay. We're gonna be okay. We're gonna be okay. We're gonna be okay, we're gonna be okay,
translation.zh: 我们会没事的

translation.en: REACHER: So what'd you learn?
translation.zh: 你搜集到了什么证据？

translation.en: You want me to say you were right. You want me to say that this isn't the fight.
translation.zh: 你是对的 不应该打这个官司

translation.en: James Barr should die.
translation.zh: 詹姆斯 巴尔该死 他死有余辜

translation.en: Maybe he should. I meant, what did you learn about the victims.
translation.zh: 我是说 有关遇害者的情况

translation.en: What more do you want?
translation.zh: 你想听什么？他们是五个无辜的人

translation.en: They were five innocent people senselessly murdered.
translation.zh: 莫名其妙地就被杀了 对不起 你穿上衬衫好吗？

translation.en: I'm sorry. Could you please put a shirt on?
translation.zh: 对不起 你穿上衬衫好吗？

translation.en: This is my shirt.
translation.zh: 这就是我的衬衫

translation.en: You lose your luggage?
translation.zh: -你行李箱丢了？ -我没有行李

translation.en: Uh, what was I saying?
translation.zh: 我刚才说什么了？五个无辜的人

translation.en: Five innocent people. Murdered at random, yes.
translation.zh: 很随意地被杀死了

translation.en: (EXHALES DEEPLY) You know how many people die in this country every year?
translation.zh: 知道在美国 每年有多少人死亡吗？

translation.en: Two and a half million.
translation.zh: 250万人

translation.en: That means every day,
translation.zh: 每天约有七千美国人闭上眼睛

translation.en: roughly 7,000 average Americans wake up for the last time.
translation.zh: 每天约有七千美国人闭上眼睛 上周五 他们五个人死在一个地点

translation.en: Last Friday, five of them converged
translation.zh: 上周五 他们五个人死在一个地点

translation.en: on a single spot and died together. Is that random?
translation.zh: 这是巧合吗？

translation.en: What else would you call it?
translation.zh: 那你说是什么? 可能达伦和南希之间有婚外情

translation.en: Well, take Darren and Nancy. Odds are they were having an affair.
translation.zh: 可能达伦和南希之间有婚外情

translation.en: Excuse me?
translation.zh: 你说什么？ 人们不会在上班路上给妻子买花

translation.en: You don't buy roses for your wife on the way to work.
translation.zh: 人们不会在上班路上给妻子买花 而是在回家的路上买

translation.en: You buy them on the way home.
translation.zh: 而是在回家的路上买

translation.en: And you don't worry about a charge
translation.zh: 正常人不会担心信用卡上的付款记录

translation.en: showing up on your credit card
translation.zh: 正常人不会担心信用卡上的付款记录 因为结婚纪念日在周末

translation.en: when your anniversary is that weekend.
translation.zh: 因为结婚纪念日在周末

translation.en: Unless it's the gift you're hiding.
translation.zh: 除非想隐瞒这个礼物

translation.en: And that's why she kept walking
translation.zh: 她一直向前走

translation.en: while everyone else ran.
translation.zh: 而其他人都在逃跑

translation.en: You can't prove that.
translation.zh: -你无法证明你的推论 -这很难吗？

translation.en: How hard would it be? Cell phones, e-mails.
translation.zh: 手机 电子邮件

translation.en: All it takes is someone willing to dig.
translation.zh: 只要有人愿意调查就行

translation.en: What's your point exactly?
translation.zh: 你想说什么？ 那两个遇害者不是偶然相遇

translation.en: My point is that two of the victims weren't there strictly by chance.
translation.zh: 那两个遇害者不是偶然相遇

translation.en: I need a list of Barr's known associates.
translation.zh: 我需要一份巴尔合伙人的名单 他没有合伙人 很孤僻

translation.en: There isn't one. He didn't have any.
translation.zh: 他没有合伙人 很孤僻

translation.en: He's a classic loner. He didn't even talk to his neighbors.
translation.zh: 他甚至都不和邻居说话 他是个安静的人

translation.en: He was a quiet man. Never bothered anyone.
translation.zh: -从来不打扰别人 -没错

translation.en: Yeah, exactly. You have his credit card statement?
translation.zh: 你有他的信用卡对账单吗？

translation.en: I can get it. Why?
translation.zh: 我可以弄到 要它做什么？ 我需要知道他曾去过的地方

translation.en: I need the list of all the places he hung out.
translation.zh: 我需要知道他曾去过的地方

translation.en: Bars, bowling alleys, strip clubs,
translation.zh: 酒吧 保龄球馆 脱衣舞俱乐部 射击场

translation.en: gun ranges.
translation.zh: 酒吧 保龄球馆 脱衣舞俱乐部 射击场 也许有人见过他

translation.en: Anywhere someone would remember him.
translation.zh: 也许有人见过他

translation.en: What do we hope to find?
translation.zh: 你希望找到什么？

translation.en: I need some sleep.
translation.zh: 我要睡一会 你也是

translation.en: You don't really think I'm gonna...
translation.zh: 你以为我会

translation.en: Be back to pick me up at 7:00.
translation.zh: 七点钟回来接我

translation.en: Yep. Absolutely.
translation.zh: 好的 没问题

translation.en: Who's with you?
translation.zh: 谁和你在一起？出什么事了？

translation.en: Oh, that's him, isn't it? I ain't seeing you, man!
translation.zh: 是他 对不对？我看不见你

translation.en: Relax. What happened?
translation.zh: 别紧张 出什么事了？

translation.en: Barr's attorney hired an investigator.
translation.zh: 巴尔的律师雇了一名调查员 叫雷彻 军队里的顶级高手

translation.en: Name of Reacher. Some sort of top-shelf Army cop.
translation.zh: 叫雷彻 军队里的顶级高手

translation.en: He was in Baghdad the same time as Barr.
translation.zh: 他和巴尔同时在巴格达服役

translation.en: So?
translation.zh: 怎么了？巴尔点名要这个大兵

translation.en: So Barr asked for this soldier by name.
translation.zh: 怎么了？巴尔点名要这个大兵 他今天出现在高速公路桥

translation.en: Then he shows up at the river today.
translation.zh: 他今天出现在高速公路桥

translation.en: Then up on the highway.
translation.zh: 他好像知道我们的事

translation.en: And you said we don't like people asking questions.
translation.zh: 你说过不喜欢别人向我们提问题

translation.en: No, we sure don't. So I took steps.
translation.zh: 对 不喜欢 所以我采取了措施

translation.en: You took steps.
translation.zh: 你采取了措施？

translation.en: Local people. My guys.
translation.zh: 找的当地人 我哥们

translation.en: And it blew back on you.
translation.zh: 你要遭报应了

translation.en: I figured five guys would do it.
translation.zh: 我以为他们五人能解决问题

translation.en: Mmm. This franchise was yours to manage.
translation.zh: -你已超越了你的权限 -到此为止

translation.en: That's all. Maintenance is our thing, you understand?
translation.zh: 下一步是我们的事 明白吗？ 我知道 我无法联系你

translation.en: Yeah, I understand. I couldn't reach you!
translation.zh: 我知道 我无法联系你

translation.en: Well, that's how this works.
translation.zh: 这是我们的工作方式

translation.en: Well, I had to make a decision!
translation.zh: 我必须作出决定 -我要这些当地人的名字 -在文件里

translation.en: These locals, I want their names. It's in the file.
translation.zh: -我要这些当地人的名字 -在文件里

translation.en: Any of them know who you are?
translation.zh: 他们中有人认识你吗？

translation.en: Just one, but I took care of it.
translation.zh: 有一个 但我已经解决了

translation.en: You... (SIGHS) Where's the body? It's distributed.
translation.zh: -尸体在哪儿？ -已经分尸了

translation.en: (SCOFFS) Relax! No one's gonna find it.
translation.zh: 别紧张 没人会找到他的

translation.en: Suppose we want it found, yeah?
translation.zh: -假如我们要找呢？ -为什么？

translation.en: Why the hell would you want it found? 'Cause we got a way of doing things so they stay done. Clean!
translation.zh: 我们有自己的方式 干净利落

translation.en: A missing person isn't clean.
translation.zh: 丢了一个人就是不干净 你本想杀一人却殃及了五个人

translation.en: Christ's sakes, man. You only had to kill
translation.zh: 你本想杀一人却殃及了五个人

translation.en: one goddamn person. You tapped five! You call that clean?
translation.zh: 你本想杀一人却殃及了五个人 就是干净利落 我是说不露马脚

translation.en: I call it done.
translation.zh: 就是干净利落 我是说不露马脚 他们找的是射手 不是靶子

translation.en: They're looking at the shooter, not the target.
translation.zh: 他们找的是射手 不是靶子

translation.en: Jesus.
translation.zh: 天哪 现在事情一团糟 以后不能再乱了

translation.en: We make it messy now so it won't get messy later.
translation.zh: 现在事情一团糟 以后不能再乱了 我们不能留下任何问题

translation.en: And we don't leave questions unanswered ever.
translation.zh: 我们不能留下任何问题 永远不留 好吧 我搞定

translation.en: Okay, all right. Okay. I can fix this.
translation.zh: 永远不留 好吧 我搞定 -睁开眼睛 -不 我没看你

translation.en: MAN: Open your eyes. No, I ain't seeing you!
translation.zh: -睁开眼睛 -不 我没看你 现在无所谓了

translation.en: MAN: It makes no difference now.
translation.zh: 现在无所谓了

translation.en: I made a mistake.
translation.zh: 我犯了错误

translation.en: I mean, you can still use me, just tell me how to fix...
translation.zh: 我还有用 告诉我怎么做

translation.en: To survive.
translation.zh: 要活命就别说搞定 因为你搞不定

translation.en: Don't say "fix it," because you can't.
translation.zh: 要活命就别说搞定 因为你搞不定 我们刚清理完一个乱摊子

translation.en: We covered up the one mess. You made another.
translation.zh: 我们刚清理完一个乱摊子 -你又弄出一个来 -你说得对

translation.en: All right. You're right. You're right. You're absolutely right. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 说的没错 对不起

translation.en: Just tell me what I have to do.
translation.zh: 告诉我怎么做

translation.en: I was in prison in Siberia.
translation.zh: 我在西伯利亚蹲过监狱 我穿着死人的衣服 度过了严冬

translation.en: I spent my first winter wearing a dead man's coat.
translation.zh: 我穿着死人的衣服 度过了严冬

translation.en: A hole in one pocket.
translation.zh: 衣兜破了

translation.en: I chewed these fingers off
translation.zh: 为了不让冻伤病变成坏疽 我就吃掉了这几个指头

translation.en: before the frostbite could turn to gangrene.
translation.zh: 我就吃掉了这几个指头

translation.en: These I gave up to avoid working in the sulfur mine.
translation.zh: 这几个是为了逃避到硫矿劳动吃掉的

translation.en: That is how I survived when so many others did not.
translation.zh: 就这样 我活了下来 而许多人死去了

translation.en: A man this rare can always be of use.
translation.zh: 像我这样的人 总会有用武之地

translation.en: So show me. Show me you are rare.
translation.zh: 做给我看 让我看看你有多坚强

translation.en: Show me you'll do anything to survive.
translation.zh: 让我看看为了生存 你会做任何事

translation.en: I don't understand. The fingers from your left hand.
translation.zh: 我不明白 吃掉你左手的手指

translation.en: Have you... Have you got a knife?
translation.zh: 你有刀吗？

translation.en: Did I have a knife in Siberia?
translation.zh: 我在西伯利亚时没有刀

translation.en: No... Come on, you've got to be kidding.
translation.zh: 算了吧 你在跟我开玩笑

translation.en: You can do it. Show me.
translation.zh: 你可以做到 做给我看

translation.en: Can't! I can't.
translation.zh: 做不到 我做不到

translation.en: Always the bullet. I can't! I don't understand.
translation.zh: 我真不明白 还得用子弹

translation.en: What do we do about the soldier?
translation.zh: 我们怎么处理那个大兵？

translation.en: What we always do.
translation.zh: 用老办法对付

translation.en: Barr's credit card statement. Eyewitness testimonies.
translation.zh: 巴尔的信用卡对账单 目击证人证词 咖啡

translation.en: Coffee. You take it black, right?
translation.zh: 不加奶的咖啡 对吧？

translation.en: Yeah. What can I say? I take my work home.
translation.zh: 我能说什么 我在家里工作

translation.en: Afraid Barr's credit card statement's a dead end.
translation.zh: 巴尔的信用卡对账单是个死胡同

translation.en: No bars, no strip joints, nothing.
translation.zh: 没有酒吧 没有脱衣舞俱乐部 只有汽油和杂货店的账单

translation.en: Pretty much just gas and groceries.
translation.zh: 只有汽油和杂货店的账单

translation.en: I need you to look for gun ranges
translation.zh: 从这开始找 50到100英里内的射击场

translation.en: between 100 and 150 miles from here.
translation.zh: 50到100英里内的射击场 只找300码以上射击距离的射击场

translation.en: Limit your search to ranges longer than 300 yards.
translation.zh: 只找300码以上射击距离的射击场

translation.en: Sure, if you tell me why.
translation.zh: 可以 只要你告诉我怎么回事

translation.en: Barr consistently filled his tank on Saturday,
translation.zh: 巴尔一直都在星期六给汽车加满油 星期天再加满一次

translation.en: and again on Sunday.
translation.zh: 星期天再加满一次

translation.en: He took a long drive almost every weekend.
translation.zh: 说明周末是长途旅行

translation.en: He could be going anywhere. Yes.
translation.zh: -他可能去任何地方 -是的

translation.en: And if it's bars, bowling alleys or strip clubs,
translation.zh: 如果去酒吧 保龄球馆 脱衣舞俱乐部 我们永远都找不到

translation.en: we'll never find it.
translation.zh: 我们永远都找不到 比赛用的射击场呢 大概只有两个

translation.en: But a Match-level gun range? There might be two.
translation.zh: 比赛用的射击场呢 大概只有两个 他要自己做子弹

translation.en: And he made his own bullets. That means he shot a lot.
translation.zh: 他要自己做子弹 是因为他进行大量射击

translation.en: I'm guessing every Saturday.
translation.zh: 我猜他每个周六都要来

translation.en: Maybe with a friend.
translation.zh: 也许和一个朋友来 为什么和他的朋友谈话那么重要？

translation.en: Why is it so important you talk to his friends?
translation.zh: 为什么和他的朋友谈话那么重要？ 假如他真的有个朋友

translation.en: Assuming he had any.
translation.zh: 在汽车配件商店停一下

translation.en: Drop me at the auto parts store.
translation.zh: 在汽车配件商店停一下 等等 哪一家？

translation.en: I... Wait. Which one?
translation.zh: 等等 哪一家？ 她说的那家汽车配件商店

translation.en: I don't know. She just said "the auto parts store."
translation.zh: 她说的那家汽车配件商店

translation.en: She? Who?
translation.zh: 她？谁？你能说的具体一点吗？

translation.en: Reacher, can you be a little more specific?
translation.zh: 她？谁？你能说的具体一点吗？ 我没说任何汽车配件商店

translation.en: I didn't say "an auto parts store."
translation.zh: 我没说任何汽车配件商店 你记忆中哪家配件商店最有名？

translation.en: Which one stands out in your mind as the auto parts store?
translation.zh: 你记忆中哪家配件商店最有名？

translation.en: HELEN: You want me to wait?
translation.zh: 要我等你吗？

translation.en: No, I'll meet you back at the office later.
translation.zh: 不用 我一会去办公室找你 你怎么去？

translation.en: I'll hitch a ride.
translation.zh: 我搭顺风车

translation.en: Can I help you?
translation.zh: 你要买什么？

translation.en: Sandy work here? What's this about?
translation.zh: -桑迪在这上班吗？ -你有什么事？

translation.en: So she does, thanks. I need to speak with her.
translation.zh: 她在这儿上班 谢谢 我有话要和她说 是私事

translation.en: It's a personal matter. She's on the clock. Legal personal matter.
translation.zh: 她在工作 合法的私事

translation.en: What are you, a cop?
translation.zh: 你是警察吗？

translation.en: Call her out, Gary.
translation.zh: -叫她出来 加里 -有证件吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna need to see some I.D. Go get Sandy.
translation.zh: -叫她出来 加里 -有证件吗？ -叫桑迪 -我要看你的证件

translation.en: Well, I need to see something.
translation.zh: -叫桑迪 -我要看你的证件

translation.en: How about the inside of an ambulance?
translation.zh: 你想躺救护车里吗？

translation.en: Okay, I'm calling the police.
translation.zh: 好吧 我报警

translation.en: I don't think Sandy wants the police involved...
translation.zh: 我想桑迪不想让警察参与此事 你报吧 你 我需要帮助

translation.en: Hello? ...but let's ask. Hey! You ca...
translation.zh: 你报吧 你 我需要帮助

translation.en: Hello? I need some help. Hello? Hey! You!
translation.zh: 你报吧 你 我需要帮助 你 不允许去后面 小子

translation.en: No. You are not allowed back in here, man!
translation.zh: 你 不允许去后面 小子

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 糟了

translation.en: You know this guy?
translation.zh: -你认识这个人吗？ -告诉他

translation.en: Give us a few, Gary.
translation.zh: 你先出去 加里

translation.en: Listen, I wasn't... I didn't know.
translation.zh: 听着 我不是 我不知道 我不知道会发生那样的事

translation.en: I didn't know that was going to happen!
translation.zh: 我不知道会发生那样的事

translation.en: It was Jeb.
translation.zh: 都怪杰布 那个大个子

translation.en: Jeb Oliver.
translation.zh: 杰布 奥利弗

translation.en: He told me you were a predator.
translation.zh: 他告诉我 你是个猛男 我以为你能上勾

translation.en: You were supposed to start groping me.
translation.zh: 我以为你能上勾

translation.en: Just don't hurt me. Sandy, sit down.
translation.zh: -别伤害我 -桑迪 坐下

translation.en: Where can I find Jeb?
translation.zh: 我到哪儿能找到杰布？ 我不知道 他今天没来上班

translation.en: I don't know. He didn't come to work today.
translation.zh: 我不知道 他今天没来上班

translation.en: So he works here.
translation.zh: -他在这儿上班？ -是的

translation.en: It's bullshit, though. He cooks crystal.
translation.zh: 他贩卖冰毒 是个疯子 把他地址写下来

translation.en: His address, write it down.
translation.zh: 把他地址写下来

translation.en: I'm really sorry, mister.
translation.zh: 真的很抱歉 先生

translation.en: You were supposed to be a pervert.
translation.zh: 我以为你很容易搞定

translation.en: And it was an easy 100 bucks.
translation.zh: -我差点赚到100元 -那么点儿吗？

translation.en: When Jeb asks, you do what he says.
translation.zh: 杰布让我做 我就得按他说的做

translation.en: Am I in trouble?
translation.zh: 我有麻烦了吗？

translation.en: Not if you lend me your car.
translation.zh: 把你的车借给我 就放你一马

translation.en: I don't have a car. Well, sure you do. It's outside.
translation.zh: -我没有车 -你当然有 就在外面

translation.en: I'm guessing you're the Camaro.
translation.zh: 我猜那辆卡玛洛是你的 把那辆小皮卡借给我

translation.en: That whimsy little pickup has Gary written all over it. Keys?
translation.zh: 把那辆小皮卡借给我

translation.en: I can't. It's Jeb's car!
translation.zh: 不能借你 那是杰布的车 那我把车开到他家去

translation.en: Well, won't he be surprised when I drive it home for him.
translation.zh: 他也不会惊讶

translation.en: Who are you, mister?
translation.zh: 你是什么人 先生？

translation.en: I'm just a guy who wants to be left alone.
translation.zh: 是个不愿意被打扰的人

translation.en: I get off work at six!
translation.zh: 我六点下班

translation.en: Maybe we could...
translation.zh: 也许我们可以

translation.en: Sandy, listen.
translation.zh: 桑迪 听着

translation.en: Now, you seem like a sweet girl.
translation.zh: 你是个可爱的女孩

translation.en: You're pretty. You're obviously sharp,
translation.zh: 漂亮 聪明 给加里管账

translation.en: You don't have to let these guys use you.
translation.zh: 你不能让这些家伙利用你

translation.en: It's just what girls like me do.
translation.zh: 我这样的女孩只能干这个

translation.en: You got money? A little.
translation.zh: -你有钱吗？ -有一点

translation.en: Get out of town for a couple of days.
translation.zh: -你要出城几天 -为什么？

translation.en: Get out of town, Sandy.
translation.zh: 去外地 桑迪

translation.en: Is Jeb home?
translation.zh: 杰布在家吗？

translation.en: I have a warrant to search the premises.
translation.zh: 我有房屋搜查令

translation.en: I see.
translation.zh: 我明白了

translation.en: Well, if you don't mind...
translation.zh: 如果你不介意的话

translation.en: MAN: Get him! Get him! Get him!
translation.zh: 揍他

translation.en: I got this! Okay, okay.
translation.zh: -我有这个 -好吧

translation.en: Don't move.
translation.zh: -不许动 -我告诉你

translation.en: When I move, you pull the trigger.
translation.zh: 我一动 你就开枪

translation.en: Aah!
translation.zh: -杰布在哪儿？ -他不在这儿

translation.en: Where's Jeb? He's not here.
translation.zh: -杰布在哪儿？ -他不在这儿 -我到哪儿能找到他？ -天哪 我的手

translation.en: Where can I find him?
translation.zh: -我到哪儿能找到他？ -天哪 我的手

translation.en: Jesus! My hand!
translation.zh: -我到哪儿能找到他？ -天哪 我的手 你不该玩枪 我到哪儿能找到他？

translation.en: Well, you shouldn't play with guns.
translation.zh: 你不该玩枪 我到哪儿能找到他？

translation.en: Where can I find him?
translation.zh: 你不该玩枪 我到哪儿能找到他？ 你开他的车 你该告诉我才对

translation.en: You're the one driving his car. You tell... (CRIES OUT)
translation.zh: 你开他的车 你该告诉我才对

translation.en: The last I saw him, we was all leaving jail.
translation.zh: 我上次见到他 是出狱那天

translation.en: He said he had to see a guy.
translation.zh: -他要去见一个人 -什么人？

translation.en: What guy? Who? I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道 不知道 我发誓

translation.en: I don't know, I swear.
translation.zh: 他妈妈吸多了

translation.en: Next I know, his mom woke up from a bender
translation.zh: 他妈妈吸多了 醒来后 他的东西就都丢了

translation.en: and his shit's all gone.
translation.zh: 醒来后 他的东西就都丢了

translation.en: Is he the sort to light out like that?
translation.zh: 他是那种不辞而别的人吗？ 不是 他从来不丢下他妈妈不管

translation.en: No, no, man. He'd never leave his moms alone.
translation.zh: 不是 他从来不丢下他妈妈不管

translation.en: Shit ain't right.
translation.zh: 这事有点不对劲 你有车吗？在外面 钥匙

translation.en: Got a car? It's outside.
translation.zh: 你有车吗？在外面 钥匙

translation.en: Keys. My hand, man. They're in my pock... Aah!
translation.zh: 我的手 钥匙在我兜里 好吧

translation.en: Now look at your friends.
translation.zh: 看看你的朋友

translation.en: Now look at my face. Do you ever want to see me again?
translation.zh: 看看我 你还想再看见我吗？

translation.en: No way. Am I stealing your car?
translation.zh: -不想 -我能用你的车吗？

translation.en: Use it as long as you like.
translation.zh: 你想用多长时间都行

translation.en: You're very kind.
translation.zh: 你真好

translation.en: REACHER: I think Jeb Oliver's dead.
translation.zh: 我认为杰布 奥利弗已经死了 杰布 奥利弗是谁？

translation.en: Who's Jeb Oliver? He was the guy from the bar.
translation.zh: 酒吧里那家伙

translation.en: Jesus, how hard did you hit him?
translation.zh: 天哪 你把他打成什么样了？

translation.en: What? No, not me.
translation.zh: 什么？不 不是我 他被人杀了

translation.en: No, he was murdered. And someone tried to make it look like he left town.
translation.zh: 杀手想造成他离开城里的假象

translation.en: Well, maybe he just left town.
translation.zh: 也许他真的走了 旅行还把浴帘装到行李中吗？

translation.en: You pack your shower curtain when you travel?
translation.zh: 旅行还把浴帘装到行李中吗？ 这是你得出的结论？

translation.en: Is this what you base your conclusions on?
translation.zh: 这是你得出的结论？ 你的头怎么了？

translation.en: What is that on your head?
translation.zh: 你的头怎么了？

translation.en: You don't want to know.
translation.zh: 你不会想到的

translation.en: You said on the phone you wanted to submit your findings.
translation.zh: 你想提交你的调查结果

translation.en: James Barr was a sniper. Not the best, not the worst.
translation.zh: 詹姆斯 巴尔是个狙击手 不是最优秀的 也不是最差的 他受过两年训练

translation.en: But he trained non-stop for two years.
translation.zh: 他受过两年训练 这种训练能起什么作用？

translation.en: What does any training do?
translation.zh: 任何训练都有作用 技能变成条件反射 肌肉记忆

translation.en: Skills become reflex. Muscle memory.
translation.zh: 技能变成条件反射 肌肉记忆

translation.en: You do without thinking.
translation.zh: 不用思考就行动 把战术灌输给他们

translation.en: It also makes people who aren't necessarily smart seem smart
translation.zh: 把战术灌输给他们 使不聪明的人看上去很聪明

translation.en: by beating some tactical awareness into them.
translation.zh: 使不聪明的人看上去很聪明 99%指控巴尔的证据

translation.en: Now, 99% of the evidence your father has against Barr
translation.zh: 在巴格达都没有发现

translation.en: didn't exist in Baghdad,
translation.zh: 不是因为巴尔聪明

translation.en: not because Barr was smart, but because he was trained.
translation.zh: 而是因为他受过训练

translation.en: See, from that garage,
translation.zh: 在那个停车场开枪 射手的眼睛会受到阳光照射

translation.en: the shooter had the sun in his eyes.
translation.zh: 射手的眼睛会受到阳光照射 目标左右移动

translation.en: Targets were moving left and right.
translation.zh: 对任何射手来说 都很难击中

translation.en: It's difficult conditions for any sniper.
translation.zh: 对任何射手来说 都很难击中 但巴格达 你不是说巴尔在停车场吗？

translation.en: But Baghdad, you said Barr was in a parking garage then.
translation.zh: 但巴格达 你不是说巴尔在停车场吗？ 因为在巴格达 太阳照在他背后

translation.en: REACHER: Because in Baghdad, the sun's behind him.
translation.zh: 因为在巴格达 太阳照在他背后 目标是从正前方过来 列成一队

translation.en: Targets coming straight ahead, single file.
translation.zh: 目标是从正前方过来 列成一队 对普通射手来说 这是最理想的条件

translation.en: Ideal conditions for even an average shooter
translation.zh: 对普通射手来说 这是最理想的条件

translation.en: and the exact same conditions
translation.zh: 同样的条件 他在高速公路桥上也能找到

translation.en: he would've had up on that highway bridge.
translation.zh: 他在高速公路桥上也能找到

translation.en: Up there, he would never even have to get out of the van.
translation.zh: 在桥上 他甚至都不用下车

translation.en: No parking meter.
translation.zh: 没有停车计时器 没有摄像头

translation.en: No camera.
translation.zh: 不会留下任何作案痕迹

translation.en: No trace evidence left behind. And his escape is assured.
translation.zh: 不会留下任何作案痕迹 能轻松地逃走 他不可能在河边杀死那些人

translation.en: Now, I'm not saying that he couldn't have killed
translation.zh: 他不可能在河边杀死那些人

translation.en: those people at the river, but he wouldn't have.
translation.zh: 他不会用这种方式干

translation.en: Not that way.
translation.zh: -那么 你是说他疯了 -不是

translation.en: So you're saying he's crazy. No.
translation.zh: 那你是什么意思？

translation.en: Well, what exactly are you saying?
translation.zh: 那你是什么意思？ 我相信任何单一证据

translation.en: Any single piece of evidence I'd buy. But all of it?
translation.zh: 我相信任何单一证据 纤维 指纹 飞走的弹壳 但全部加起来？

translation.en: Fibers, fingerprints, stray brass, I mean...
translation.zh: 纤维 指纹 飞走的弹壳 但全部加起来？ 究竟是谁付的停车费？

translation.en: And who the hell pays for parking?
translation.zh: 究竟是谁付的停车费？ 神志是否正常

translation.en: Sane or crazy, that just doesn't make sense.
translation.zh: 神志是否正常 这都解释不通 巴尔想让人抓住他

translation.en: Okay. So Barr, he wanted to get caught
translation.zh: 这都解释不通 巴尔想让人抓住他 他想让你去抓他

translation.en: and he wanted you to catch him.
translation.zh: 他想让你去抓他

translation.en: That would not explain how Barr,
translation.zh: 这也解释不了

translation.en: an average shooter firing in poor conditions,
translation.zh: 巴尔怎么会在那种情况下开枪 -而且还没有失手 -他失手了

translation.en: never missed. He did miss.
translation.zh: -而且还没有失手 -他失手了

translation.en: A pristine bullet,
translation.zh: 崭新的子弹

translation.en: conveniently trapped by a liquid backstop.
translation.zh: 留在被击中的液体中

translation.en: The same bullet that tied Barr's gun to the killings.
translation.zh: 同样的子弹从巴尔的枪射向遇害者 作为起诉书中重要证据是有争议的

translation.en: And arguably the prosecution's single most important piece of evidence. If Barr
translation.zh: 作为起诉书中重要证据是有争议的 如果巴尔想被抓住

translation.en: wanted to get caught, he didn't miss.
translation.zh: 他为何没有失手？

translation.en: Either way, it doesn't make sense.
translation.zh: 怎么解释都说不通 如果他想逃 早就逃了

translation.en: If he wanted to get away with it, he likely would have
translation.zh: 如果他想逃 早就逃了 如果他想被人抓住

translation.en: and if he wanted to get caught,
translation.zh: 巴尔不可能做到这么完美

translation.en: Barr was incapable of such perfection.
translation.zh: 巴尔不可能做到这么完美 或者说他运气很好 6发6中

translation.en: Or maybe he just got lucky, six shots out of six.
translation.zh: 或者说他运气很好 6发6中 直到这帮家伙袭击我之前

translation.en: That's what I was willing to accept,
translation.zh: 直到这帮家伙袭击我之前 我愿意接受这个观点

translation.en: Whoever sent them made a mistake.
translation.zh: 无论是谁派他们来都是个错误 那只是酒吧斗殴而已

translation.en: It was just a bar fight.
translation.zh: 那只是酒吧斗殴而已

translation.en: Maybe.
translation.zh: 也许吧

translation.en: Or maybe someone got nervous, tried to run me off.
translation.zh: 或者是有人害怕了 想把我吓走 或把我打昏

translation.en: Or put me in a coma, right next to their patsy.
translation.zh: 或把我打昏 放在容易上当的人身边

translation.en: Patsy?
translation.zh: 易上当的人？

translation.en: It was such a great crime scene.
translation.zh: 这么完美的犯罪现场 竟没有人仔细想想 是不是太完美了

translation.en: No one stopped to think it might be too great.
translation.zh: 竟没有人仔细想想 是不是太完美了

translation.en: Not Emerson.
translation.zh: 爱默生没想 你父亲也没想

translation.en: Not your father. Not even Barr's own defense attorney.
translation.zh: 甚至你也没想

translation.en: But Barr knew I would,
translation.zh: 谁都认为巴尔有罪

translation.en: no matter how much I wanted it to be true.
translation.zh: 巴尔知道我会怀疑

translation.en: That's why he asked for me.
translation.zh: 所以他才要求见我

translation.en: Wait. Are you suggesting...
translation.zh: 等等 你是说 詹姆斯 巴尔

translation.en: James Barr is innocent.
translation.zh: 是无辜的

translation.en: You can see what this is, can't you?
translation.zh: 你知道这是什么想法吗？

translation.en: You've got a case in your hands
translation.zh: 你接这个案子 也许是你最后一个

translation.en: that may be the last case you'll ever have
translation.zh: 也许是你最后一个

translation.en: and you'll do anything not to hit the bottom of it.
translation.zh: 你却想方设法不结案

translation.en: Helen. You know, you never should have retired.
translation.zh: -海伦 -你不该退役的

translation.en: Just, look. Listen.
translation.zh: 听着 据我所知 三天前 你还举牌子站在十字路口

translation.en: For all I know, you were standing at an intersection
translation.zh: 三天前 你还举牌子站在十字路口

translation.en: with a cardboard sign three days ago.
translation.zh: 三天前 你还举牌子站在十字路口 我竟然雇用了你 我父亲说的对

translation.en: And I hired you. Jesus, my father was right.
translation.zh: 我竟然雇用了你 我父亲说的对 -海伦 -现在全明白了

translation.en: Helen. Helen. It makes total sense now.
translation.zh: -海伦 -现在全明白了 -海伦 -你那种生活方式 到处游荡

translation.en: It's the way you live, the way you move around.
translation.zh: -海伦 -你那种生活方式 到处游荡 你不适应现实生活 是吗？

translation.en: You're just not cut out for the real world, are you?
translation.zh: 你不适应现实生活 是吗？ 你害怕会有巴尔那样下场？

translation.en: Are you afraid you'll end up like Barr?
translation.zh: 你害怕会有巴尔那样下场？

translation.en: Look out the window.
translation.zh: 海伦 你看看窗外

translation.en: No, I have work to do.
translation.zh: 不 我有工作要做 你快走吧

translation.en: Let... Let go of me.
translation.zh: 放开我

translation.en: Would you tell me what you see? I see the same
translation.zh: 告诉我 你看到了什么？ 我看到每天都能看到的东西

translation.en: things I see every day.
translation.zh: 我看到每天都能看到的东西 设想一下你从没见过这些

translation.en: Well, imagine you've never seen it.
translation.zh: 设想一下你从没见过这些

translation.en: Imagine you've spent your whole life in other parts of the world
translation.zh: 你是在另一个地方度过人生 你为自由而战

translation.en: being told every day you're defending freedom.
translation.zh: 你为自由而战 你终于无法忍受了

translation.en: And finally you decide you've had enough.
translation.zh: 你终于无法忍受了

translation.en: Time to see what you've given up your whole life for.
translation.zh: 看看你为之奋斗的是什么 为自己争取到了一些自由

translation.en: Maybe get some of that freedom for yourself.
translation.zh: 为自己争取到了一些自由

translation.en: Look at the people.
translation.zh: 看看这些人

translation.en: Now tell me which ones are free.
translation.zh: 告诉我哪些人是自由的

translation.en: Free from debt. Anxiety.
translation.zh: 没有债务 无忧无虑 没有压力

translation.en: Fear. Failure. Indignity. Betrayal.
translation.zh: 恐惧 失败 侮辱 背叛

translation.en: How many wish they were born knowing what they know now?
translation.zh: 人们都希望生来就知道现在的事 问问自己 有多少人愿意

translation.en: Ask yourself how many would do things the same way all over again?
translation.zh: 问问自己 有多少人愿意 反复做同一件事？

translation.en: And how many would live their lives like me?
translation.zh: 有多少人愿意像我这样生活？

translation.en: Now look at the silver Audi across the street,
translation.zh: 看看对面街上的那辆奥迪车 整天都在跟踪我

translation.en: What does that prove?
translation.zh: 那能证明什么？

translation.en: Here's the tag number.
translation.zh: 这是车牌号 多久能查出车主？

translation.en: How long would it take you to run it? At this time of night? I don't know. An hour?
translation.zh: -大晚上的 我不确定 一小时吧 -查吧

translation.en: Do it, and then I'll leave.
translation.zh: 查到后 我就离开

translation.en: When?
translation.zh: 什么时候？

translation.en: No, this is my problem now. I'll handle it.
translation.zh: 不 这是我的问题 我来解决

translation.en: You're blown. The lawyer's running the license plates.
translation.zh: 你暴露了 那个律师正在查车牌

translation.en: Yeah. So do it?
translation.zh: 动手吗？好

translation.en: Go to this address.
translation.zh: 去这个地址

translation.en: HELEN: All right, let's just say that Barr didn't do it.
translation.zh: 好吧 假如巴尔没干这事 或是有人指使他

translation.en: Or did it 'cause someone put him up to it.
translation.zh: 或是有人指使他

translation.en: Either way, what have you got?
translation.zh: -你有什么证据？ -是阴谋

translation.en: Conspiracy. Yeah, conspiracy to kill five random people?
translation.zh: 预谋杀死五个平民百姓 没有动机

translation.en: There's no motive.
translation.zh: 预谋杀死五个平民百姓 没有动机 很荒唐 是吗？

translation.en: It's ridiculous, right? It's grassy knoll ludicrous.
translation.zh: 荒唐的有点离谱

translation.en: No point looking any further.
translation.zh: -进一步调查没有意义了 -没错

translation.en: Exactly.
translation.zh: 说的对

translation.en: What's this?
translation.zh: 这是什么？ 查查杀人动机

translation.en: The motive. Just hold onto it.
translation.zh: 查查杀人动机 我们玩猜谜语游戏吗？

translation.en: What are we playing, Clue?
translation.zh: 我们玩猜谜语游戏吗？

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 对 给我吧

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: You sure that car was following you all day?
translation.zh: 你确定那辆车跟了你一天吗？

translation.en: As soon as you picked me up. Why?
translation.zh: 你接上我就开始

translation.en: It's registered to a company called Lebendauer Enterprises.
translation.zh: 这辆车属于乐班德尔公司 奥赖恩 阿彻 乐班德尔公司

translation.en: A conspiracy to kill five random people?
translation.zh: 预谋杀死五个平民

translation.en: That's ridiculous.
translation.zh: 很荒唐

translation.en: Four. Four random people.
translation.zh: 四个 四个平民

translation.en: To hide one specific target.
translation.zh: 为了掩盖一个特定的目标

translation.en: REACHER: Someone needed Oline Archer's construction business.
translation.zh: 有人想要奥赖恩 阿彻的建筑生意

translation.en: And Oline wouldn't let it go.
translation.zh: 而奥赖恩不愿意交出项目

translation.en: It's a convincing theory.
translation.zh: 这推理很有说服力

translation.en: But it's just a theory.
translation.zh: 但这只是猜测

translation.en: The first round is the least accurate.
translation.zh: 第一枪射击是最不准确的 狙击手称之为冷射

translation.en: The snipers call it a cold shot.
translation.zh: 狙击手称之为冷射 你的目击证人描述说

translation.en: Meanwhile, your eyewitness described a pause
translation.zh: 你的目击证人描述说 第一枪和第二枪之间有停顿

translation.en: between the first and second rounds.
translation.zh: 第一枪和第二枪之间有停顿 第二枪射手很沉稳

translation.en: The one shot where the killer took his time.
translation.zh: 第二枪射手很沉稳 奥赖恩 阿彻是第二个遇害者

translation.en: HELEN: And Oline Archer was the second victim.
translation.zh: 奥赖恩 阿彻是第二个遇害者 这一枪 至关重要

translation.en: The one shot that mattered.
translation.zh: 这一枪 至关重要

translation.en: But it's just a theory.
translation.zh: 这还只是猜测

translation.en: This frame was custom made for Barr.
translation.zh: 这是根据巴尔习惯而设的圈套

translation.en: Whoever chose him knew about Baghdad
translation.zh: 选中他的人了解巴格达的事 能讲出这事的人只有巴尔

translation.en: and the only one who could have
translation.zh: 能讲出这事的人只有巴尔

translation.en: told him about Baghdad was Barr himself.
translation.zh: 能讲出这事的人只有巴尔 他至少会有一个朋友

translation.en: He has at least one friend. A very close one.
translation.zh: 他至少会有一个朋友 非常亲密的朋友 找到他 就能找到真正的凶手

translation.en: Now, you find that friend, you'll find the real shooter.
translation.zh: 找到他 就能找到真正的凶手 找到真正的凶手 雷彻

translation.en: Find the real shooter? Reacher,
translation.zh: 找到真正的凶手 雷彻 我的工作是向陪审团提出合理质疑

translation.en: my job is to present the jury with reasonable doubt. Period.
translation.zh: 我的工作是向陪审团提出合理质疑

translation.en: What about catching the guys who really did this?
translation.zh: 要抓住那些人 把他们绳之以法

translation.en: Oh, catching the guys who did this? Bringing them to justice?
translation.zh: 要抓住那些人 把他们绳之以法 我不能在法庭上提出这些要求

translation.en: No, I can't take this to court.
translation.zh: 揭开事件真相

translation.en: Exposing the truth.
translation.zh: 即使我相信巴尔是无辜的

translation.en: Even if I believed Barr is innocent, it's not my job.
translation.zh: 即使我相信巴尔是无辜的 那也不是我的工作

translation.en: I am just a lawyer. I'm not a cop.
translation.zh: 我只是个律师 不是警察

translation.en: And frankly, neither are you.
translation.zh: 坦白地说 你也不是

translation.en: I can't do this anymore.
translation.zh: 我不能再做这种事了

translation.en: Thanks for the coffee, counselor.
translation.zh: 谢谢你的咖啡 大律师

translation.en: Sandy?
translation.zh: 桑迪

translation.en: Wait, it is Sandy, isn't it?
translation.zh: 你是桑迪 对不对？

translation.en: Do I know you?
translation.zh: 我认识你吗？

translation.en: Charlie. Jeb's friend? Oh, come on, don't break my heart.
translation.zh: 查理 杰布的朋友 太伤我心了

translation.en: I'm sorry, I don't remember.
translation.zh: 对不起 我不记得了

translation.en: Well, we were both pretty wasted.
translation.zh: 我们当时都喝高了

translation.en: BOTH: Yeah. (CHUCKLES)
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: What, you live here? Just up there.
translation.zh: -你住在这儿？太巧了 -就在楼上

translation.en: No shit.
translation.zh: 我刚搬到那后面住

translation.en: I just moved in around the back! How crazy is that?
translation.zh: 令人难以置信 太有趣了

translation.en: Wow! You, uh... You look great.
translation.zh: -你真漂亮 -谢谢

translation.en: Well, look, you know, I don't want to keep you, so...
translation.zh: 听着 我不想耽误你时间 我们找时间喝一杯

translation.en: Maybe we can grab a drink sometime.
translation.zh: 我们找时间喝一杯

translation.en: Yeah, maybe. Hey, how about tonight?
translation.zh: -行啊 -今晚怎么样？

translation.en: I'm meeting some people.
translation.zh: 我约了别人

translation.en: Okay. Well, some other time, then.
translation.zh: 好吧 那就改天吧

translation.en: Some other time. Do it here.
translation.zh: -改天再说 什么？ -在这动手

translation.en: HELEN: Reacher!
translation.zh: 雷彻

translation.en: There's a gun range in Ohio, targets out to 700 yards.
translation.zh: 俄亥俄州有个射击场 目标距离700码 唯一符合你要求的场地

translation.en: The only range that matches your requirements.
translation.zh: 唯一符合你要求的场地

translation.en: You should sleep.
translation.zh: 你应该睡一会 明天要开很长时间车

translation.en: You have a long drive tomorrow,
translation.zh: 你应该睡一会 明天要开很长时间车 我要查一下奥赖恩

translation.en: and I need to go to city hall and pull up Oline's legal history.
translation.zh: 我要查一下奥赖恩

translation.en: I wouldn't do that. Not till I get back.
translation.zh: 先别那样做 等我回来再说 如果我是对的

translation.en: If I'm right, someone killed four random people
translation.zh: 有人杀了四个平民 目的是不让调查员去查奥赖恩

translation.en: so no one would look directly at Oline.
translation.zh: 目的是不让调查员去查奥赖恩 如果我分析得对

translation.en: And if I'm right, just saying her name could get you killed.
translation.zh: 只要提到她的名字 你就会送命 你认为我会害怕吗？

translation.en: You saying I should be scared?
translation.zh: 你认为我会害怕吗？

translation.en: Well, are you smart? Obviously.
translation.zh: -你聪明吗？ -那不明摆着吗？

translation.en: Then don't be scared.
translation.zh: 那就不必害怕

translation.en: What exactly am I looking for?
translation.zh: 到底要我找什么？ 打死这个女孩的人

translation.en: Someone who could kill that girl with one punch.
translation.zh: 打死这个女孩的人

translation.en: Oh, you want the guy in 1109. Ernie Johnson.
translation.zh: 你要的人在1109室 厄尼 约翰逊

translation.en: You'll see.
translation.zh: 你要看看吗？

translation.en: Out of the car!
translation.zh: 快下车

translation.en: That's our suspect! Move, move!
translation.zh: 他是我们要抓的嫌疑犯 快追

translation.en: Suspect is headed north on State Route 65.
translation.zh: 疑犯在65号公路向北行驶

translation.en: I need backup and air support.
translation.zh: 派增援部队和空中支援

translation.en: Hold up! All clear!
translation.zh: 等一下 没有人

translation.en: Oh, God, I just don't believe it. I don't believe it!
translation.zh: 我就是不相信 我不信

translation.en: I issued the warrant an hour ago.
translation.zh: 我刚签发了逮捕令 有人看到雷彻 今天去了她的商店

translation.en: According to the victim's boss,
translation.zh: 有人看到雷彻 今天去了她的商店

translation.en: Reacher was seen at her place of work this morning.
translation.zh: 有人看到雷彻 今天去了她的商店 他还威胁她的老板

translation.en: Where he threatened her boss.
translation.zh: 他还威胁她的老板

translation.en: The car he was driving tonight belonged to a friend of Jeb Oliver's.
translation.zh: 他开的是杰布 奥利弗朋友的车

translation.en: The man he assaulted.
translation.zh: 他打了那个人 不 是他们打了雷彻

translation.en: No, those guys assaulted Reacher.
translation.zh: 不 是他们打了雷彻 在杰布家 雷彻把三个人打伤住院

translation.en: Reacher put three more men in the hospital this afternoon at Jeb Oliver's place.
translation.zh: 在杰布家 雷彻把三个人打伤住院

translation.en: After arriving in Jeb Oliver's car.
translation.zh: 雷彻开杰布的车去了他家 杰布出院后 再也没人看见他

translation.en: And Jeb hasn't been seen since he left the hospital.
translation.zh: 杰布出院后 再也没人看见他 如果你知道雷彻在哪 告诉我们

translation.en: Helen, if you know where Reacher is, you need to tell us.
translation.zh: 如果你知道雷彻在哪 告诉我们 我不知道

translation.en: I don't know where he is. I have not seen him
