translation.zh: 几个小时前 我离开办公室后

translation.en: since he left my office a few hours ago.
translation.zh: 就再也没见到他

translation.en: I think she's telling the truth.
translation.zh: 我认为她说的是实话

translation.en: Oh, you think, Dad? Fuck you!
translation.zh: 你认为？去你的 我告诉过你不要接近他

translation.en: Hey, I told you not to go near him.
translation.zh: 我告诉过你不要接近他 你登堂入室 然后像审问犯人一样审我

translation.en: You come into my home and you treat me like I'm an accessory!
translation.zh: 你登堂入室 然后像审问犯人一样审我 -好了 我来处理 -我没说完

translation.en: (SCOFFS) Please! You know... All right. All right. Come on. Enough.
translation.zh: -好了 我来处理 -我没说完

translation.en: Look, let me handle it. I'm not done. You're both done. Just get out.
translation.zh: 你们俩说完了 出去

translation.en: This is Helen. REACHER: I'm guessing the police are there?
translation.zh: -我是海伦 对 -我猜警察在那儿吧

translation.en: Yep. By your response I'm guessing I have about 30 seconds
translation.zh: 我猜不超过30秒

translation.en: before you hand them the phone.
translation.zh: -他们就会让你把电话给他们 -会的

translation.en: If that.
translation.zh: -他们就会让你把电话给他们 -会的 如果他们能陷害巴尔

translation.en: If you believe someone could frame Barr,
translation.zh: 如果他们能陷害巴尔 -也能陷害我 -我想有这个可能

translation.en: you have to believe they could do the same to me. I suppose that's possible.
translation.zh: -也能陷害我 -我想有这个可能

translation.en: She was a sweet kid, Helen.
translation.zh: 她是个可爱的孩子 海伦

translation.en: And they killed her because of me.
translation.zh: 他们是因为我 才杀死了她

translation.en: They want me to run.
translation.zh: 他们逼我不要插手 我决不

translation.en: But I won't.
translation.zh: 我要查个水落石出

translation.en: I'm going to finish this. No, that's not a good idea.
translation.zh: 这不是个好主意

translation.en: Listen. Two things. One, I, uh...
translation.zh: 听着 两件事 第一

translation.en: I stole your car.
translation.zh: 我偷了你的车

translation.en: If you want to end this,
translation.zh: 如果你要结束合作 挂上电话 然后报案说车丢了

translation.en: just hang up the phone and report it missing.
translation.zh: 挂上电话 然后报案说车丢了

translation.en: And I'll understand.
translation.zh: 明白了 还有别的事吗？

translation.en: And anything else?
translation.zh: 明白了 还有别的事吗？ 早点告诉你 怕你接受不了

translation.en: I thought I'd be pushing it if I mentioned this earlier.
translation.zh: 早点告诉你 怕你接受不了 我担心会发生意外

translation.en: Now I guess all bets are off.
translation.zh: 我担心会发生意外 对爱默生和你父亲谈话要小心

translation.en: You need to watch what you say to Emerson and your father.
translation.zh: 对爱默生和你父亲谈话要小心 我认为他们中有一个人参与了此案

translation.en: I think one of them is in on it.
translation.zh: 我认为他们中有一个人参与了此案 -好 谢谢你告诉我 我挂了 -等等

translation.en: All right. Thanks for calling. I have to go.
translation.zh: -好 谢谢你告诉我 我挂了 -等等

translation.en: Wait. I've been followed from day one.
translation.zh: 从第一天开始 我被跟踪了

translation.en: Only three people knew I was here.
translation.zh: 只有三个人知道我来这里

translation.en: Emerson, your father and you.
translation.zh: 爱默生 你父亲还有你

translation.en: You need to ask yourself, who has the most to lose if we clear Barr?
translation.zh: 想想 帮巴尔洗清罪名 谁损失最大？

translation.en: Who tried to warn you off me?
translation.zh: 谁警告你要离开我？

translation.en: Of course, I could be wrong. If you think I am,
translation.zh: 当然了 我可能是错的 如果你认为我是错的 就挂上电话

translation.en: just hand over the phone. There's no sense getting any deeper.
translation.zh: 进一步调查没有意义了

translation.en: Who's that you're talking to? The office.
translation.zh: -你在和谁说话？ -办公室的人

translation.en: Are we done?
translation.zh: -我们谈完了吗？ -海伦 听着

translation.en: Helen, listen.
translation.zh: -我们谈完了吗？ -海伦 听着 晚安

translation.en: You got some fine shooters here.
translation.zh: 你这里有优秀的射手吗？

translation.en: Fine as frog's hair.
translation.zh: 想找优秀的 很难找

translation.en: Rarer, too.
translation.zh: 想找优秀的 很难找 大多数来这的人 根本就不会射击

translation.en: 'Cause most of them fellas out there
translation.zh: 大多数来这的人 根本就不会射击

translation.en: can't shoot worth a damn. (CHUCKLES)
translation.zh: 大多数来这的人 根本就不会射击 让他们把三发子弹打中靶子

translation.en: You ask them to put three rounds in the black, well,
translation.zh: 让他们把三发子弹打中靶子

translation.en: they'll suck it.
translation.zh: 根本打不中

translation.en: I'm looking for the owner. That'd be me. Martin Cash.
translation.zh: -我要找店主 -我就是 马丁 凯时

translation.en: Aaron Ward.
translation.zh: 艾伦 沃德 我能为你做点什么？沃德先生

translation.en: What can I do you for, Mr. Ward? Ward?
translation.zh: 我能为你做点什么？沃德先生 我要找一起在伊拉克服役的朋友

translation.en: Yeah. I'm looking for a friend of mine. We served in Iraq.
translation.zh: 我要找一起在伊拉克服役的朋友 他从人间蒸发了 了解吗？

translation.en: The guy just dropped off the grid, you know?
translation.zh: 他从人间蒸发了 了解吗？ 常有发生

translation.en: It happens. Yep. Yeah. Yeah.
translation.zh: 常有发生 他曾是名狙击手

translation.en: Anyway, he was a shooter.
translation.zh: 他曾是名狙击手 最后一次听到他的消息时 他还活着

translation.en: Last I heard, he lived around here somewhere and I...
translation.zh: 最后一次听到他的消息时 他还活着

translation.en: When did he get out of the Army?
translation.zh: 他是什么时候从部队退役的？

translation.en: Well, I didn't say the Army.
translation.zh: 我没说他是军人 你说过和他一起服役 你不是盖锅头

translation.en: Well, you said you served with him. You're no jarhead.
translation.zh: 你说过和他一起服役 你不是盖锅头 明眼人一眼就能看出来

translation.en: Man on a flying horse could see that.
translation.zh: 明眼人一眼就能看出来 我爸爸是海军陆战队的

translation.en: Well, my father was in the Corps, if that helps.
translation.zh: 我爸爸是海军陆战队的 这只能说明你是半个强人

translation.en: Well, (CHUCKLES) that makes you half human.
translation.zh: 这只能说明你是半个强人

translation.en: Your friend got a name? Yeah. James Barr.
translation.zh: -你朋友叫？ -詹姆斯 巴尔

translation.en: James Barr.
translation.zh: -詹姆斯 巴尔 -没听说过

translation.en: I think you have.
translation.zh: 我想你听说过

translation.en: I think you've been dreading the moment
translation.zh: 警察来询问他情况的那一刻

translation.en: some cop comes in here asking after him.
translation.zh: 警察来询问他情况的那一刻 你很害怕

translation.en: Because it's for sure some soccer mom around here
translation.zh: 这附近足球妈妈比起自家后院的游泳池

translation.en: is more worried about your range than she is about the pool in her backyard
translation.zh: 或洗菜池里的排水清洁器 更担心你的射击场的事

translation.en: or the drain cleaner under her sink.
translation.zh: 更担心你的射击场的事

translation.en: Wouldn't matter to her if Barr did his killing 100 miles away,
translation.zh: 巴尔在100英里以外杀人也没什么 可他是在你这训练的

translation.en: only that he came here to rehearse.
translation.zh: 可他是在你这训练的 足球妈妈一纸诉状就能让你停业

translation.en: She'd have a case to shut you down
translation.zh: 足球妈妈一纸诉状就能让你停业

translation.en: and nothing better to do.
translation.zh: -你会无计可施 -你想怎么样？

translation.en: I want to know who Barr's friends were.
translation.zh: 我想知道巴尔的朋友是谁

translation.en: Those boys out there,
translation.zh: 这帮家伙

translation.en: they're mighty touchy when it comes to their constitutional rights.
translation.zh: 当你触动他们的权利时 他们很敏感 假如我告诉他们 警察调查过我的会员会怎样？

translation.en: Suppose I tell them a cop is in here asking after my members?
translation.zh: 假如我告诉他们 警察调查过我的会员会怎样？ 我不是警察

translation.en: I'm not a cop. What are you?
translation.zh: 我不是警察 你是干什么的？ 我为巴尔的律师工作

translation.en: I work for Barr's attorney.
translation.zh: 你是干什么的？ 我为巴尔的律师工作 我们相信他是无辜的

translation.en: We have reason to believe he's innocent.
translation.zh: 我们相信他是无辜的

translation.en: The hell you say.
translation.zh: -你胡说什么？ -就算是他有罪

translation.en: Be that as it may, I'm the only one
translation.zh: -你胡说什么？ -就算是他有罪 我也是唯一跑这来调查他的人

translation.en: who's bothered to track him this far.
translation.zh: 我也是唯一跑这来调查他的人

translation.en: You help me out, I'll be in your debt.
translation.zh: 你帮我一次 我欠你个人情

translation.en: And if I don't?
translation.zh: 如果我不帮呢？

translation.en: Maybe you can coach soccer.
translation.zh: 也许你会去做足球教练

translation.en: You put three in the center and maybe we'll talk. Huh?
translation.zh: 你把三发子弹打中靶心我们再谈

translation.en: Can I have a few to warm up?
translation.zh: 能多给几发热热身吗？

translation.en: Six inches right.
translation.zh: 偏右六英寸 这是你的第二枪 沃德先生

translation.en: That's your mulligan, Mr. Ward. Play ball!
translation.zh: 这是你的第二枪 沃德先生 准备射击 开始

translation.en: You're a little rusty, Mr. Reacher.
translation.zh: 你有点生疏了 雷彻先生

translation.en: I saw a man by that name shoot for the Wimbledon Cup,
translation.zh: 十年前有人用这个名字参加射击大赛

translation.en: what, ten years ago.
translation.zh: 十年前有人用这个名字参加射击大赛 我肯定你没打过扬基队的二垒手

translation.en: And I'm pretty sure you never played second base for the Yankees
translation.zh: 我肯定你没打过扬基队的二垒手

translation.en: Now, I'll answer one question.
translation.zh: 现在 我回答一个问题

translation.en: Who's your best shooter?
translation.zh: -谁是最佳射手？ -詹姆斯 巴尔

translation.en: I pulled all these down as soon as I heard about the shooting.
translation.zh: 听到他打死人 我就把这些摘下来了

translation.en: That's the best shot
translation.zh: 这是我过平民生活以来 看到最棒的一枪

translation.en: I ever seen this side of civilian life.
translation.zh: 看到最棒的一枪

translation.en: Suppose I told you Barr wasn't this good on his best day in the Army.
translation.zh: 我告诉你 巴尔在部队也没打过这么好 这是我亲手贴上的靶子

translation.en: I handed out those targets myself.
translation.zh: 这是我亲手贴上的靶子 上面有我的笔迹

translation.en: That's my scrawl on every one.
translation.zh: 上面有我的笔迹 你也把靶子放在最远处吗？

translation.en: Do you hang them downrange, too?
translation.zh: 你也把靶子放在最远处吗？

translation.en: What, are you serious?
translation.zh: 你是什么意思？

translation.en: I'm saying it's possible that Barr had a friend.
translation.zh: 我是说巴尔可能有个朋友 他换掉了射击场里的靶子

translation.en: One who switched the targets on the range.
translation.zh: 他换掉了射击场里的靶子

translation.en: Maybe Barr let him.
translation.zh: 也许是巴尔让他换的 当他的大名挂在墙上 感觉自己是冠军

translation.en: Made him feel like King Shit having his name up on your wall.
translation.zh: 当他的大名挂在墙上 感觉自己是冠军

translation.en: I never saw one real shooter
translation.zh: 我从没见过一个真正的射手

translation.en: who would do that for his own mother.
translation.zh: 为了自己的妈妈会这么做

translation.en: Unless he was framing his mother for multiple murder
translation.zh: 除非他想陷害她妈妈杀了好几个人

translation.en: and using your range to do it.
translation.zh: 而且是在你这个射击场干的

translation.en: Barr didn't come alone, did he?
translation.zh: 巴尔不是一个人来的 对吗？

translation.en: You know, one of these nuts is likely to kill you,
translation.zh: 如果他们发现录像 就有人来杀你

translation.en: they find that camera, there.
translation.zh: 如果他们发现录像 就有人来杀你 录像就在这 没有疯子会杀我

translation.en: Hell, the camera's there 'cause one of these nuts is likely to kill me.
translation.zh: 录像就在这 没有疯子会杀我

translation.en: There's Barr. I always liked him. Always liked him.
translation.zh: 那是巴尔 我一直很喜欢他

translation.en: There. Him.
translation.zh: 就是这儿 他

translation.en: That son of a bitch.
translation.zh: 这个混蛋

translation.en: Helen Rodin speaking.
translation.zh: 我是海伦 罗丁 找到凶手备选人照片

translation.en: REACHER: Got a candidate for our shooter.
translation.zh: 找到凶手备选人照片

translation.en: Picture, possible prints
translation.zh: 可能是他的指纹 还有个证人

translation.en: and one pissed-off eyewitness.
translation.zh: 可能是他的指纹 还有个证人 我现在不能说话

translation.en: I can't talk right now.
translation.zh: 我现在不能说话

translation.en: Just give me three hours to get back.
translation.zh: 我三个小时后回去 这之前不要和任何人谈话

translation.en: And don't talk to anyone until I get there.
translation.zh: 这之前不要和任何人谈话

translation.en: I'll look into that, thanks.
translation.zh: 我会处理这事 谢谢

translation.en: This is just what I could pull this morning.
translation.zh: 这些是我今天早上拿到的资料 纳税记录 市里和州里的项目批准书

translation.en: Tax records, city and state permit applications, contract bids.
translation.zh: 纳税记录 市里和州里的项目批准书 合同招标书 是格鲁吉亚一家空壳公司

translation.en: Shell corporation in Georgia.
translation.zh: 合同招标书 是格鲁吉亚一家空壳公司 挨着俄罗斯的国家 不在弗罗里达

translation.en: That's the one next to Russia, not Florida.
translation.zh: 挨着俄罗斯的国家 不在弗罗里达

translation.en: They work one city at a time,
translation.zh: 他们开发一个城市 要求当地建筑公司在开工前

translation.en: acquiring a local construction concern
translation.zh: 要求当地建筑公司在开工前

translation.en: just ahead of major civic redevelopment.
translation.zh: 要求当地建筑公司在开工前 先建造没人需要的桥梁

translation.en: They build bridges no one needs.
translation.zh: 先建造没人需要的桥梁

translation.en: Highways no one uses.
translation.zh: 没人用的高速公路 他们就像癌症一样

translation.en: They're like a cancer.
translation.zh: 他们就像癌症一样 癌细胞在不停地生长

translation.en: A cell that won't stop growing.
translation.zh: 癌细胞在不停地生长

translation.en: They moved 12 times in 15 years.
translation.zh: 在15年里搬了12次家

translation.en: Atlanta, Albuquerque,
translation.zh: 亚特兰大 阿尔布开克 奥斯汀

translation.en: Austin, Oklahoma City, Sacramento.
translation.zh: 俄克拉荷马城 萨克拉曼多 总在被指腐败的名单中

translation.en: Always amidst allegations of corruption
translation.zh: 总在被指腐败的名单中 包括几千万公共资金不翼而飞

translation.en: including millions of dollars in missing public funds.
translation.zh: 包括几千万公共资金不翼而飞

translation.en: And yet never an investigation.
translation.zh: 可却从来未被调查过 甚至从没有被质询过

translation.en: Never even an inquiry.
translation.zh: 甚至从没有被质询过 乐班德尔公司口碑极佳

translation.en: It's as if Lebendauer Enterprises were above reproach.
translation.zh: 乐班德尔公司口碑极佳

translation.en: maybe that's because the allegations come from the competition.
translation.zh: 也许那些是竞争对手的指责

translation.en: Outbid. Bitter.
translation.zh: 出高价 充满敌意

translation.en: Like Oline Archer.
translation.zh: 比如奥赖恩 阿彻 也许乐班德尔公司在跟重要部门合作

translation.en: Or maybe Lebendauer has the cooperation of key officials.
translation.zh: 也许乐班德尔公司在跟重要部门合作 合作不畅时

translation.en: And maybe when that cooperation isn't enough,
translation.zh: 合作不畅时 他们就杀掉那些收买不了的人

translation.en: they kill people who won't be bought off.
translation.zh: 他们就杀掉那些收买不了的人

translation.en: Like Oline Archer.
translation.zh: 比如奥赖恩 阿彻 这样的传言你相信多少？

translation.en: Helen, how much of this do you honestly believe?
translation.zh: 这样的传言你相信多少？ 我相信多少不重要

translation.en: It doesn't matter how much I believe.
translation.zh: 我相信多少不重要

translation.en: It doesn't even matter how much I can prove.
translation.zh: 甚至连我能证实多少都无关紧要

translation.en: It only matters how much is true.
translation.zh: 重要的是其中有多少是真的

translation.en: Do you know how delusional you sound?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？你这是妄想

translation.en: What happened to you?
translation.zh: 你怎么回事？ 你真的坚决要处死这个人以致

translation.en: Are you really so set on putting this man to death that you'd ignore...
translation.zh: 你真的坚决要处死这个人以致

translation.en: I pulled all of this paper under my own name.
translation.zh: 所有文件都是我自己获得的

translation.en: If Jack Reacher's right,
translation.zh: 如果杰克 雷彻说的对

translation.en: my life, your daughter's life,
translation.zh: 我的生命 你女儿的生命

translation.en: is in danger now.
translation.zh: 危在旦夕了

translation.en: Whatever happens to me next is on your head,
translation.zh: 我接下来出什么事都是你造成的

translation.en: whether you're involved or not.
translation.zh: 无论你参与了 还是没参与

translation.en: You are the District Attorney
translation.zh: 你是地方检察官 我已经给了你确凿的证据

translation.en: and I've given you compelling evidence
translation.zh: 我已经给了你确凿的证据 来调查乐班德尔公司

translation.en: to investigate Lebendauer Enterprises.
translation.zh: 来调查乐班德尔公司 你的下一步行动 将告诉我你的立场

translation.en: Your next move will tell me which side you're on.
translation.zh: 你的下一步行动 将告诉我你的立场

translation.en: I see. It's a test.
translation.zh: 我明白 你在考验我

translation.en: (CHUCKLES) Well, this may be hard for you to believe, but I do love you.
translation.zh: 你很难相信 我真的很爱你

translation.en: And obviously I'm not going to turn a blind eye,
translation.zh: 我是不会视而不见的 无论我发现这些事有多么荒诞

translation.en: no matter how absurd I find all of this.
translation.zh: 无论我发现这些事有多么荒诞

translation.en: (SIGHS) So, if you really believe that you're in danger,
translation.zh: 如果你真的认为你有危险

translation.en: if you believe that, then the next order of business,
translation.zh: 真的确信 那么接下来的任务

translation.en: is to put you in protective custody right now.
translation.zh: 就是马上对你进行保护性监禁

translation.en: And how safe will I be if you're part of it? Jesus, Helen.
translation.zh: -如果你也是同谋呢？ -天哪 海伦

translation.en: Business meeting or personal? Hard to tell them apart.
translation.zh: -公事还是私事？可不是 -很难分辨

translation.en: (CELL PHONE RINGING)
translation.zh: 采石场办公室

translation.en: Helen?
translation.zh: -海伦？ -不是

translation.en: Sorry, wrong number. Is this Reacher?
translation.zh: -对不起 打错了？ -你是雷彻吗？

translation.en: Who is this?
translation.zh: 你是谁？

translation.en: Is this Reacher?
translation.zh: 你是雷彻吗？

translation.en: It's you. The guy from the car.
translation.zh: 是你 开车跟踪我的家伙

translation.en: It's your boyfriend.
translation.zh: 你男朋友

translation.en: Reacher, is it you?
translation.zh: 雷彻 是你吗？

translation.en: Helen, are you hurt?
translation.zh: 海伦 你受伤了吗？ 如果你一小时后不来 就废了她

translation.en: Well, she's gonna be if you're not here in one hour.
translation.zh: 如果你一小时后不来 就废了她

translation.en: Do I have to tell you how this works?
translation.zh: 要我告诉你这里的情况吗？ 你追得我到处跑 怕我被别人跟踪

translation.en: You'll bounce me around to make sure I'm not followed,
translation.zh: 你追得我到处跑 怕我被别人跟踪 让我走进埋伏圈 再杀掉我

translation.en: then walk me into an ambush and kill me.
translation.zh: 让我走进埋伏圈 再杀掉我

translation.en: Aw, you ruined my surprise.
translation.zh: 你毁了我的惊喜 好 我会给你一个更好的

translation.en: Well, I can do one better.
translation.zh: 好 我会给你一个更好的 我去过关键小溪射击场

translation.en: I went down to the gun range at Hinge Creek.
translation.zh: 我去过关键小溪射击场 我拿到了照片和指纹

translation.en: I got the picture, prints, and I'm going to the Feds.
translation.zh: 我拿到了照片和指纹 我要去联邦调查局 你随便处置律师

translation.en: The lawyer's all yours.
translation.zh: 你随便处置律师

translation.en: Get the Zec.
translation.zh: 叫翟科来

translation.en: On second thought, I'd like to kill you. Let's say winner take all.
translation.zh: 我想杀了你 胜者为王

translation.en: Listen to me, you prick.
translation.zh: 听着 你这个混蛋 你要是不过来 我就杀了这个婊子

translation.en: I will kill this bitch if you're not here in one...
translation.zh: 你要是不过来 我就杀了这个婊子

translation.en: Shit!
translation.zh: 该死的

translation.en: You think I'm a hero?
translation.zh: 你以为我是英雄吗？

translation.en: I am not a hero. I'm a drifter with nothing to lose.
translation.zh: 我不是英雄 我是无忧无虑的游侠

translation.en: You killed that girl to put me in a frame.
translation.zh: 你杀了那个女孩来陷害我 我要扒了你的皮 喝干你的血

translation.en: I mean to beat you to death and drink your blood from a boot.
translation.zh: 我要扒了你的皮 喝干你的血

translation.en: Now, this is how it's going to work.
translation.zh: 听着 这么办吧 你给我地址

translation.en: You're gonna give me the address
translation.zh: 听着 这么办吧 你给我地址 等我准备好了 就去找你算账

translation.en: and I'll be along when I am damn good and ready.
translation.zh: 等我准备好了 就去找你算账 如果我打电话她不接

translation.en: If she doesn't answer the phone when I call this number,
translation.zh: 如果我打电话她不接

translation.en: if I even think you've hurt her,
translation.zh: 我认为你杀了她

translation.en: I disappear.
translation.zh: 我就消失 你是聪明人 我不是在威胁你

translation.en: And if you're smart, that scares you,
translation.zh: 你是聪明人 我不是在威胁你

translation.en: because I'm in your blind spot
translation.zh: 你在明 我在暗 而且我又没有别的事要做

translation.en: and I have nothing better to do.
translation.zh: 而且我又没有别的事要做

translation.en: You got a pen?
translation.zh: 你有笔吗？

translation.en: Don't need one.
translation.zh: 用不着那玩意

translation.en: If I had a dollar for every time the Army called
translation.zh: 如果每次军方来找陆战队员帮忙

translation.en: the Corps for help.
translation.zh: 我都收一美元就好了

translation.en: You have something for me? Yeah.
translation.zh: -你有东西要给我吗？ -有 给

translation.en: You're kidding, right?
translation.zh: 你开玩笑吧 虽然我十年前看过你射击

translation.en: Just because I saw you shoot ten years ago
translation.zh: 虽然我十年前看过你射击

translation.en: doesn't mean I'll let you kill some asshole with my gun.
translation.zh: 可并不意味着我会让你用我的枪

translation.en: I told you how serious this was.
translation.zh: 我跟你说过情况非常危急

translation.en: And I showed up, didn't I?
translation.zh: 我也被卷进去了 对吗？

translation.en: So let's get to it.
translation.zh: 咱们大干一场吧

translation.en: Now, your shooter will be
translation.zh: 杀你的凶手会到这来 在那些灯光后面

translation.en: right up there behind those lights. Okay?
translation.zh: 在那些灯光后面

translation.en: He can cover both roads
translation.zh: 他能朝这条路射击

translation.en: coming and going.
translation.zh: 他能朝这条路射击 你一站起来 就能击毙你

translation.en: And kill you just as soon as you stand up.
translation.zh: 你一站起来 就能击毙你 你能干掉他吗？

translation.en: Well, can you take him out?
translation.zh: 你能干掉他吗？

translation.en: What, to dinner you mean?
translation.zh: 什么？干掉他？

translation.en: Look, I don't know the type of people
translation.zh: 我不知道你都和什么人交往

translation.en: you normally associate with, Reacher.
translation.zh: 我不知道你都和什么人交往 我没有毫无准备

translation.en: But I'm not in the habit of driving out to the boonies at the drop of a hat
translation.zh: 我没有毫无准备 就进入荒野 解决掉几个陌生人的习惯 好吗？

translation.en: and just picking off some total strangers, all right?
translation.zh: 解决掉几个陌生人的习惯 好吗？

translation.en: Anyway, I can't see anything, not with them lights up.
translation.zh: 那些灯太亮 我什么也看不清

translation.en: So shoot them out.
translation.zh: -那就打灭它 -对 可以

translation.en: Yeah, sure. And then he knows right where I am.
translation.zh: 然后他就能看到我在何处

translation.en: I might as well set myself on fire.
translation.zh: 我这不是引火烧身吗？

translation.en: No, sir. I'll start shooting when he does.
translation.zh: 不 先生 他开枪 我才开枪

translation.en: And how do you propose we get him started?
translation.zh: 你说我们引他先开枪怎么样？

translation.en: Well, you could always start running.
translation.zh: 好 你可以突然开始快跑

translation.en: What's wrong with your eye?
translation.zh: 你的眼睛怎么了？ 我视力好着呢

translation.en: I'm saving my night vision.
translation.zh: 我视力好着呢

translation.en: Hey, Gunny, you mind if I ask you kind of
translation.zh: 老牛仔 问你个私人问题你不介意吧？

translation.en: a personal question?
translation.zh: 老牛仔 问你个私人问题你不介意吧？ 你认为我不能射击了吗？

translation.en: What, you don't think I can shoot anymore?
translation.zh: 你认为我不能射击了吗？

translation.en: It is a perishable skill.
translation.zh: 好枪法很难保持一辈子

translation.en: Yeah, well, the sun will be up in an hour.
translation.zh: 是啊 一小时后太阳就升起来了

translation.en: Let's get going.
translation.zh: 咱们走吧

translation.en: I heard them call you the Zec.
translation.zh: 我听到他们叫你翟科

translation.en: That means "prisoner."
translation.zh: 那是囚犯的意思 是吗？

translation.en: Tell me, killing all those people,
translation.zh: 杀了这么多人

translation.en: I have to believe the money you're making can't possibly be enough to just...
translation.zh: 我相信你赚的钱 不可能足够用来

translation.en: Enough?
translation.zh: 说够了吗？

translation.en: There is no such thing.
translation.zh: 根本没有这回事

translation.en: We take what can be taken.
translation.zh: 我们只拿属于我们的东西

translation.en: This is what we do.
translation.zh: 我们就是这么做的

translation.en: And you?
translation.zh: 而你呢？

translation.en: This one I think I understand, but you?
translation.zh: 这个人我能理解 可是你呢？

translation.en: Why'd you do it?
translation.zh: 你为什么要这么做？

translation.en: You make it sound like I had a choice.
translation.zh: 你说得好像我有选择权

translation.en: Oh, didn't you?
translation.zh: 你没有吗？

translation.en: You'll see.
translation.zh: 你会明白的

translation.en: You should know I've taken steps,
translation.zh: 你们应该知道 我已经采取了措施 -如果 -如果你发生意外

translation.en: that if anything happens...
translation.zh: -如果 -如果你发生意外

translation.en: If anything happens to you,
translation.zh: -如果 -如果你发生意外 也会在你父亲面前

translation.en: it will happen in front of your father
translation.zh: 也会在你父亲面前

translation.en: while he begs for your life.
translation.zh: 他祈求留你一条小命

translation.en: You should never have involved him.
translation.zh: 你当初就不该和他搅在一起 现在你必须说服他忘掉这一切

translation.en: Now you will have to convince him to forget,
translation.zh: 现在你必须说服他忘掉这一切

translation.en: for your sake and for his.
translation.zh: 为了你 也为了他好

translation.en: You say nothing, but I see defiance in your eyes.
translation.zh: 你不说话 我能看到你的眼中充满了蔑视

translation.en: That is a look I have seen many, many times.
translation.zh: 这种眼神我看到很多次了

translation.en: When the soldier comes,
translation.zh: 等那个大兵来了之后 你亲眼看着他死去

translation.en: when you watch how he dies, it will change you.
translation.zh: 那会改变你的想法

translation.en: You will want to forget me then.
translation.zh: 那时你就会想忘掉我

translation.en: Reacher?
translation.zh: -雷彻 -你没事吧？

translation.en: They're ready for you.
translation.zh: 他们准备杀掉你

translation.en: They'd like to think so.
translation.zh: 他们喜欢这么想

translation.en: Don't do this. Please don't do this. Not for me.
translation.zh: 请你不要来 不要为了我 海伦 在没抓到我之前他们不会伤害你

translation.en: Listen, Helen, they're not gonna hurt you until they have me.
translation.zh: 海伦 在没抓到我之前他们不会伤害你

translation.en: And that's never going to happen.
translation.zh: 相信我 你在听吗？

translation.en: You just hang in there.
translation.zh: 你要坚持住

translation.en: 'Cause I'm coming to get you.
translation.zh: 我会去救你

translation.en: Now say you believe me.
translation.zh: 快说你相信我

translation.en: I believe you.
translation.zh: 我相信你

translation.en: This was a bad idea.
translation.zh: 这真是个坏主意

translation.en: Any time now, Gunny.
translation.zh: 老牛仔 随时准备射击

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: Where the hell are you, Gunny?
translation.zh: 你到底在哪儿呀 神枪手？

translation.en: Suck it!
translation.zh: 省省吧

translation.en: You should go.
translation.zh: 你该走了

translation.en: Toss it.
translation.zh: 放下枪

translation.en: REACHER: I know you're in there, Emerson.
translation.zh: 爱默生 我知道你在里面

translation.en: It was staring me right in the face.
translation.zh: 我有你的犯罪证据

translation.en: The one piece that just didn't fit.
translation.zh: 一个证据不能解释一切

translation.en: The quarter.
translation.zh: 硬币

translation.en: Nobody would have thought to dump that meter.
translation.zh: 没人想到计时表的硬币就是证据

translation.en: Not even me.
translation.zh: 连我都不会这么想

translation.en: You were wrong about my father.
translation.zh: 你错怪了我的父亲

translation.en: I wouldn't make a big thing of it.
translation.zh: 我不会把事情闹大的

translation.en: Who is he?
translation.zh: -他是谁？ -他是二号人物

translation.en: That's John Doe Number Two.
translation.zh: 暗杀行动的策划者

translation.en: The man on the grassy knoll. The thing under the bed.
translation.zh: 暗杀行动的策划者 幕后指使者 他们叫他翟科

translation.en: They call him the Zec.
translation.zh: 幕后指使者 他们叫他翟科

translation.en: Zec? Prisoner.
translation.zh: 翟科 就是囚犯

translation.en: What's your real name?
translation.zh: 你的真名叫什么？

translation.en: I was born in October.
translation.zh: 我是十月出生的 当我数到我生日的那月 我就开枪

translation.en: When I get to my birthday, I'm gonna pull the trigger.
translation.zh: 当我数到我生日的那月 我就开枪

translation.en: One. Two.
translation.zh: -一 二 -切诺维克

translation.en: Chelovek. Zec Chelovek.
translation.zh: 翟科 切诺维克

translation.en: Chelovek? Chelovek? Human.
translation.zh: 切诺维克 就是人

translation.en: Prisoner Human Being.
translation.zh: 你叫囚犯人

translation.en: That's your real name? That is all I remember.
translation.zh: -这就是你的真名？ -我就记住这些

translation.en: Call the police.
translation.zh: 打电话报警

translation.en: Were you really going to shoot him?
translation.zh: 你刚才真想杀了他吗？

translation.en: I knew I wouldn't have to.
translation.zh: 不想杀他

translation.en: One look at this guy and you know he'll do anything to survive.
translation.zh: 看一眼 就知道他会想办法活下去的人 你看我一眼就知道我不是吹牛的人

translation.en: One look at me and you know I'm not bluffing.
translation.zh: 你看我一眼就知道我不是吹牛的人 是的 我有紧急的事

translation.en: HELEN: Yes, I have an emergency at...
translation.zh: 是的 我有紧急的事

translation.en: Yes, I'll hold.
translation.zh: 好 我等着

translation.en: We're in no hurry.
translation.zh: 我们不急

translation.en: With a name like yours, you're gonna feel right at home.
translation.zh: 你住监狱 就像在家一样舒服

translation.en: Prison? In America?
translation.zh: 监狱 在美国 能去美国监狱 就像住进养老院

translation.en: A retirement home. If I go to prison at all.
translation.zh: 能去美国监狱 就像住进养老院 你以为能逃脱罪名吗？

translation.en: You think you're gonna walk? You are a homeless drifter wanted for murder.
translation.zh: 你是个无家可归 被通缉的杀人犯

translation.en: Meanwhile, I am an old man
translation.zh: 我是在错误时间来到这的老头

translation.en: in the wrong place at the wrong time.
translation.zh: 我是在错误时间来到这的老头 多亏了你

translation.en: Thanks to you, who is left to say otherwise? Who?
translation.zh: 谁能活下来讲另一个故事呢？ -谁呢？ -对 我有急事

translation.en: HELEN: Yes, hello? Yes, there's...
translation.zh: -谁呢？ -对 我有急事

translation.en: Uh, I have an emergency.
translation.zh: -谁呢？ -对 我有急事 我们走着瞧 看谁进监狱

translation.en: We'll see which one of us goes to prison.
translation.zh: 我们走着瞧 看谁进监狱 可能有三 四个人死亡

translation.en: There are maybe three, four people dead.
translation.zh: 可能有三 四个人死亡

translation.en: Okay. My bet? Neither one.
translation.zh: 我猜 谁也不会

translation.en: What did you do?
translation.zh: 你干了什么？

translation.en: What's it look like?
translation.zh: 这现场看上去像什么？

translation.en: What about the truth?
translation.zh: 那真相怎么办？ 怎么才能抓到真正的凶手

translation.en: What about getting the guys who really did this?
translation.zh: 怎么才能抓到真正的凶手 把他们绳之以法？

translation.en: What about bringing him to justice?
translation.zh: 把他们绳之以法？

translation.en: I just did.
translation.zh: 我都做完了

translation.en: HELEN: What about clearing Barr?
translation.zh: 怎么洗清巴尔的罪名?

translation.en: What about clearing you?
translation.zh: 洗清你的罪名？ 你会解决的

translation.en: REACHER: I have faith you'll sort it out.
translation.zh: 你会解决的 我听说你得到了检察官的职位

translation.en: And I hear you have an in with the local D.A.
translation.zh: 我听说你得到了检察官的职位 这期间你干什么去了？

translation.en: HELEN: But what happens to you in the meantime?
translation.zh: 这期间你干什么去了？ -和以前一样 继续流浪 -等等

translation.en: I keep moving. Same as always.
translation.zh: -和以前一样 继续流浪 -等等

translation.en: Wait, is that my car?
translation.zh: 那是我的车吗？

translation.en: This the lady?
translation.zh: 是这位女士吗？

translation.en: Helen Rodin, Martin Cash.
translation.zh: -海伦 罗丁 马丁 凯时 -幸会

translation.en: You look like hell there, Army.
translation.zh: 你看上去糟透了 大兵 你问过我是否害怕和巴尔一样下场

translation.en: You asked if I was afraid I'd end up like Barr. I'm not.
translation.zh: 你问过我是否害怕和巴尔一样下场 我不怕 我恐怕最终会像这家伙一样

translation.en: I'm afraid I'll end up like this guy.
translation.zh: 我不怕 我恐怕最终会像这家伙一样 这里有好几具尸体 咱们走吧

translation.en: There's a lot of dead bodies out here. So let's get to it.
translation.zh: 这里有好几具尸体 咱们走吧 -我们应该去哪儿呢？ -等等 这就完了

translation.en: We should probably go. Wait. That's it?
translation.zh: -我们应该去哪儿呢？ -等等 这就完了

translation.en: It's just over?
translation.zh: 结束了吗？

translation.en: You'll be all right, counselor.
translation.zh: -你会没事的 大律师 -不 我需要你的时候怎么办？

translation.en: No. What if I need you? How will I find you?
translation.zh: -怎么才能找到你？ -你不需要我

translation.en: Not anymore.
translation.zh: 再也不需要了

translation.en: Get her number. Let's go!
translation.zh: 记下她的电话号码 快走吧

translation.en: I'm Helen Rodin, your attorney.
translation.zh: 我是海伦 罗丁 你的律师

translation.en: This conversation is protected by attorney-client privilege.
translation.zh: 本次谈话受律师诉讼委托人权益保护 -你明白这是什么意思吗？ -是的

translation.en: You understand what that means?
translation.zh: -你明白这是什么意思吗？ -是的

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 警察没找你谈过话 对吗？

translation.en: Now, the police didn't talk to you, did they?
translation.zh: 警察没找你谈过话 对吗？ 没有我在场 他们不能和你谈话

translation.en: They're not allowed to do that without me here.
translation.zh: 没有我在场 他们不能和你谈话

translation.en: How bad was it?
translation.zh: 情况有多严重？

translation.en: How many did I...
translation.zh: 有多少人？

translation.en: You don't remember anything about the incident?
translation.zh: 你不记得那件事了

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不记得

translation.en: But I could hear the nurses talking to those cops out there.
translation.zh: 我听到护士和警察在外面的谈话

translation.en: (SOBBING) I don't even remember wanting to do it!
translation.zh: 我不记得自己为什么要杀人

translation.en: Look, I'm not gonna fight this.
translation.zh: 这一点我不抗辩

translation.en: If they say I done it, then I did.
translation.zh: 如果他们说是我干的 那我就干了

translation.en: I done things before.
translation.zh: 以前我也干过这事

translation.en: I did something bad.
translation.zh: 我干了坏事

translation.en: Real bad.
translation.zh: 非常坏

translation.en: A long time ago.
translation.zh: 那是很久以前的事了

translation.en: And I got away with it.
translation.zh: 我逃脱了罪名

translation.en: James, how well do you know this place?
translation.zh: 詹姆斯 这个地方你熟悉吗？

translation.en: Pretty well.
translation.zh: 很熟悉

translation.en: And how do you think you would have done it?
translation.zh: 要是你做 你会怎么做？

translation.en: I guess
translation.zh: 我想

translation.en: I would have parked up on the highway.
translation.zh: 我会把车停在高速公路上 让太阳照在我后背上

translation.en: The sun would be at my back that time of day.
translation.zh: 让太阳照在我后背上

translation.en: I got a van. Set up in back.
translation.zh: 我有面包车 枪架在车后部

translation.en: Wouldn't have to worry about my brass.
translation.zh: 用不着担心弹壳会飞出去

translation.en: Get away real clean, too.
translation.zh: 轻松逃走 不留任何痕迹

translation.en: (SNIFFLING) (TEARFULLY) That sound about right?
translation.zh: 你说我这么做对吗？

translation.en: Sounds as if you know your stuff.
translation.zh: 听上去你是行家

translation.en: I forget your name.
translation.zh: -我忘了你的名字 -海伦

translation.en: Helen Rodin.
translation.zh: 海伦 罗丁

translation.en: You're going to be okay, James.
translation.zh: 你会没事的 詹姆斯

translation.en: I am gonna take care of you. You can't protect me.
translation.zh: -我会保护你 -你保护不了我

translation.en: No one can.
translation.zh: -没有人能保护我 -为什么你需要保护？

translation.en: From who?
translation.zh: 谁要害你吗？

translation.en: There's this guy.
translation.zh: 有一个家伙

translation.en: He's a kind of cop.
translation.zh: 他好像是警察

translation.en: At least he used to be.
translation.zh: 至少以前当过警察

translation.en: He doesn't care about the law.
translation.zh: 他不在乎法律

translation.en: He doesn't care about proof.
translation.zh: 不在乎证据

translation.en: He only cares about what's right.
translation.zh: 只在乎什么是公正

translation.en: MAN: Look at me when I'm talking to you!
translation.zh: 他知道我干过什么

translation.en: He knows where I am.
translation.zh: 知道我住在哪儿 这家伙

translation.en: And this guy, he made me a promise.
translation.zh: 他向我承诺过

translation.en: (WOMAN CRIES OUT) BARR: If I ever got in trouble again,
translation.zh: 如果我再遇到麻烦

translation.en: he'd be there.
translation.zh: 他会来救我
